name: unOrdinary
description: {"en":"The world is not perfect. Learning to deal with its flaws is just a normal part of life. But there comes a point where these imperfections spawn a crushing realization\u2026 that something needs to change\u2026","es":"El mundo no es perfecto. Aprender a lidiar con sus defectos es una parte normal de la vida. Pero llega un momento en que esas imperfecciones nos hacen darnos cuenta de que algo tiene que cambiar...","pl":"\u015awiat nie jest doskona\u0142y. Nauka radzenia sobie z jego wadami jest tylko normaln\u0105 cz\u0119\u015bci\u0105 \u017cycia. Ale pojawia si\u0119 punkt, w kt\u00f3rym te niedoskona\u0142o\u015bci burz\u0105 mia\u017cd\u017c\u0105c\u0105 realizacj\u0119\u2026 \u017ce co\u015b musi si\u0119 zmieni\u0107\u2026","pt-br":"O mundo n\u00e3o \u00e9 perfeito. Aprender a lidar com suas falhas \u00e9 apenas uma parte normal da vida. Mas chega um ponto em que essas imperfei\u00e7\u00f5es geram uma percep\u00e7\u00e3o esmagadora\u2026 de que algo precisa mudar."}

name: Garuru Girl
description: {"en":"Mochizuki's high school life suddenly took an interesting turn when he reunited with his childhood friend, Tsukimi Kawaru, whom he had a crush on since they were in elementary. Through a coincidence accident, he found out that Kawaru is actually a wolf girl, who couldn't control herself around him. Because Kawaru broke her promise of keeping herself in check, her sister, Utsuru, decided to pull her back home, but Mochizuki didn't like that idea and he came up with a solution to allow Kawaru to continue attending high school while keeping her identity a secret...","es":"Tras ingresar a la preparatoria, el joven, Mochizuki, se reencuentra con su primer amor, Kawa. Aunque Kawa ha crecido y se ha convertido en una hermosa y refinada jovencita, la extra\u00f1a proximidad entre ellos no ha cambiado desde sus d\u00edas de travesuras. Poco despu\u00e9s de ingresar a la escuela, Mochizuki se encuentra inc\u00f3modo con la transformaci\u00f3n de Kawa en la flor inalcanzable del campus, pero un incidente desencadena el descubrimiento de su 'secreto'. La verdadera identidad de la chica de su primer amor resulta ser una chica lobo. \u00bfC\u00f3mo cambiar\u00e1 esto su relaci\u00f3n? \u00a1Una comedia rom\u00e1ntica entre un chico inocente y una chica lobo que pertenecen a diferentes razas!","ja":"\u9ad8\u6821\u5165\u5b66\u3092\u6a5f\u306b\u3001\u521d\u604b\u306e\u5e7c\u99b4\u67d3\u30fb\u6cb3\u6d41\u3068\u518d\u4f1a\u3057\u305f\u5c11\u5e74\u30fb\u671b\u6708\u3002\u5165\u5b66\u65e9\u3005\u3001\u5b66\u5712\u306e\u9ad8\u5dba\u306e\u82b1\u3068\u306a\u3063\u305f\u6cb3\u6d41\u306b\u304e\u304f\u3057\u3083\u304f\u3057\u3066\u3057\u307e\u3046\u671b\u6708\u3060\u304c\u3001\u3068\u3042\u308b\u4e8b\u4ef6\u3092\u304d\u3063\u304b\u3051\u306b\u5f7c\u5973\u306e\u300c\u79d8\u5bc6\u300d\u3092\u77e5\u3063\u3066\u3057\u307e\u3044\u2015\u2015!?","pt-br":"A vida escolar de Mochizuki tomou um rumo interessante repentinamente quando ele reencontrou sua amiga de inf\u00e2ncia, Tsukimi Kawaru, por quem ele tinha uma queda desde o ensino fundamental. Por um acidente do destino, ele descobriu que Kawaru era na verdade uma garota-lobo, que n\u00e3o conseguia se controlar perto dele. Como Kawaru quebrou sua promessa de se manter sob controle, sua irm\u00e3, Utsuru, decidiu lev\u00e1-la de volta para casa, mas Mochizuki n\u00e3o gostou dessa ideia e elaborou uma solu\u00e7\u00e3o para permitir que Kawaru continuasse frequentando o ensino m\u00e9dio enquanto mantinha sua identidade em segredo..."}

name: Domestic na Kanojo
description: {"en":"Natsuo Fujii is in love with his teacher, Hina. Attempting to forget his feelings towards her, Natsuo goes to a mixer with his classmates where he meets an odd girl named Rui Tachibana. In a strange turn of events, Rui asks Natsuo to sneak out with her and do her a favor. To his surprise, their destination is Rui's house\u2014and her request is for him to have sex with her. There's no love behind the act; she just wants to learn from the experience. Thinking that it might help him forget about Hina, Natsuo hesitantly agrees. After this unusual encounter Natsuo now faces a new problem. With his father remarrying, he ends up with a new pair of stepsisters; unfortunately, he knows these two girls all too well. He soon finds out his new siblings are none other than Hina and Rui! Now living with both the teacher he loves and the girl with whom he had his \"first time,\" Natsuo finds himself in an unexpected love triangle as he climbs ever closer towards adulthood.","it":"Quella notte, Natsuo perse la sua verginit\u00e0. La sua partner? Si chiama Rui e l'ha incontrata appena il giorno stesso dopo la scuola. E' lei ad averlo convinto, semplicemente dicendo di voler conoscere di pi\u00f9 riguardo il sesso. Non voleva iniziare una relazione, n\u00e9 le interessava di Natsuo. In seguito, Natsuo si sente in colpa per aver perso la verginit\u00e0 con una ragazza che non gli piace neanche particolarmente. In pi\u00f9, si sente come se avesse tradito la ragazza per cui ha una cotta, la sua insegnante Hina. Un particolare triangolo amoroso che comprende Natsuo, Rui e Hina avr\u00e0 inizio quando scopriranno\u2026","pt":"Hoje \u00e0 noite, Natsuo perdeu a virgindade. Sua parceira? Seu nome \u00e9 Rui e acabou de conhec\u00ea-lo entre amigos da escola. Ela foi a \u00fanica que arquitetou essa situa\u00e7\u00e3o, com o discurso de apenas conhecer mais sobre o sexo. Ela n\u00e3o queria come\u00e7ar um relacionamento, ela n\u00e3o liga pro Natsuo. No entanto, Natsuo n\u00e3o se sente bem por perder a virgindade com uma garota que ele n\u00e3o necessariamente gosta. Na verdade, isso fez com que ele sentisse que estivesse traindo sua paix\u00e3o da escola: a professora Hina. Um tri\u00e2ngulo amoroso surge entre Natsuo, Rui e Hina e tudo acaba com eles na mesma fam\u00edlia!","ru":"\u042d\u0442\u043e \u0438\u0441\u0442\u043e\u0440\u0438\u044f \u043e \u0442\u0440\u0451\u0445 \u0433\u0435\u0440\u043e\u044f\u0445: \u041d\u0430\u0446\u0443\u043e, \u0420\u0443\u0438 \u0438 \u0425\u0438\u043d\u0435. \u0420\u0443\u0438 \u2014 \u043c\u043e\u043b\u043e\u0434\u0430\u044f \u0434\u0435\u0432\u0443\u0448\u043a\u0430, \u043d\u0435 \u0436\u0435\u043b\u0430\u044e\u0449\u0430\u044f \u0432\u0441\u0442\u0443\u043f\u0430\u0442\u044c \u0432 \u043e\u0442\u043d\u043e\u0448\u0435\u043d\u0438\u044f, \u041d\u0430\u0446\u0443\u043e \u2014 \u043e\u0431\u044b\u0447\u043d\u044b\u0439 \u0443\u0447\u0435\u043d\u0438\u043a \u0441\u0442\u0430\u0440\u0448\u0435\u0439 \u0448\u043a\u043e\u043b\u044b, \u0430 \u0425\u0438\u043d\u0430 \u2014 \u043c\u043e\u043b\u043e\u0434\u0430\u044f \u0443\u0447\u0438\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044c\u043d\u0438\u0446\u0430. \u0420\u0443\u0438, \u043d\u0435\u0441\u043c\u043e\u0442\u0440\u044f \u043d\u0430 \u0442\u043e, \u0447\u0442\u043e \u0435\u0439 \u043d\u0435 \u0438\u043d\u0442\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0441\u043d\u044b \u043e\u0442\u043d\u043e\u0448\u0435\u043d\u0438\u044f, \u0445\u043e\u0447\u0435\u0442 \u0443\u0437\u043d\u0430\u0442\u044c \u043e \u0441\u0435\u043a\u0441\u0435 \u0438 \u0443\u0433\u043e\u0432\u0430\u0440\u0438\u0432\u0430\u0435\u0442 \u041d\u0430\u0446\u0443\u043e \u043b\u0438\u0448\u0438\u0442\u044c \u0435\u0451 \u0434\u0435\u0432\u0441\u0442\u0432\u0435\u043d\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438. \u041f\u043e\u0441\u043b\u0435 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0438\u0437\u043e\u0448\u0435\u0434\u0448\u0435\u0433\u043e \u041d\u0430\u0446\u0443\u043e \u043c\u0443\u0447\u0430\u0435\u0442 \u0447\u0443\u0432\u0441\u0442\u0432\u043e \u0432\u0438\u043d\u044b, \u0442\u0430\u043a \u043a\u0430\u043a \u043e\u043d \u043b\u0438\u0448\u0438\u043b \u043d\u0435\u0432\u0438\u043d\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438 \u0434\u0435\u0432\u0443\u0448\u043a\u0443, \u043a \u043a\u043e\u0442\u043e\u0440\u043e\u0439 \u043d\u0435 \u0438\u0441\u043f\u044b\u0442\u044b\u0432\u0430\u0435\u0442 \u0447\u0443\u0432\u0441\u0442\u0432. \u041a\u0440\u043e\u043c\u0435 \u0442\u043e\u0433\u043e \u041d\u0430\u0446\u0443\u043e \u043d\u0435 \u043c\u043e\u0436\u0435\u0442 \u0437\u0430\u0431\u044b\u0442\u044c \u0438 \u043e \u0441\u0432\u043e\u0435\u0439 \u0441\u0438\u043c\u043f\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0438 \u043a \u043c\u043e\u043b\u043e\u0434\u043e\u0439 \u0443\u0447\u0438\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044c\u043d\u0438\u0446\u0435 \u0425\u0438\u043d\u0435. \u042d\u0442\u043e \u0438\u0441\u0442\u043e\u0440\u0438\u044f \u0441\u0442\u0430\u0440\u0430 \u043a\u0430\u043a \u043c\u0438\u0440 \u2014 \u0438\u0441\u0442\u043e\u0440\u0438\u044f \u043e \u043d\u0435\u0440\u0430\u0437\u0434\u0435\u043b\u0451\u043d\u043d\u043e\u0439 \u043b\u044e\u0431\u0432\u0438.","tr":"Natsuo Fujii \u00f6\u011fretmeni Hina'ya a\u015f\u0131kt\u0131r. Ona kar\u015f\u0131 olan hislerini unutma amac\u0131yla, Natsuo s\u0131n\u0131f arkada\u015flar\u0131yla bir mixer partisine gidip orada Rui Tachibana isimli garip bir k\u0131z ile tan\u0131\u015f\u0131r. Garip bir \u015fekilde Rui, Natsuo'ya onun ile birlikte partiden ka\u00e7mas\u0131n\u0131 ve ona bir iyilik yapmas\u0131n\u0131 rica eder. Fakat asl\u0131nda, gittikleri yer Rui'nin evidir\u2014ve Rui'nin bahsetti\u011fi rica da onun ile cinsel ili\u015fkiye girmesidir. Bu durumun arkas\u0131nda herhangi bir a\u015fk yoktur; Rui yaln\u0131zca deneyim elde etmek ister. Hina'y\u0131 unutmas\u0131na yard\u0131mc\u0131 olaca\u011f\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcncesiyle, Natsu karars\u0131zca kabul eder. Bu s\u0131ra d\u0131\u015f\u0131 kar\u015f\u0131la\u015fman\u0131n ard\u0131ndan, Natsuo'yu yeni bir problem kar\u015f\u0131lar. Babas\u0131n\u0131n yeniden evlenmesi sonucunda, bir \u00e7ift \u00fcvey k\u0131z karde\u015fi olur; fakat ne yaz\u0131k ki, Natsuo\nbu iki k\u0131z karde\u015fi \u00e7ok iyi tan\u0131yordur. Hemen ard\u0131ndan bu k\u0131z karde\u015flerin Hina ve Rui'den ba\u015fkas\u0131 olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 \u00f6\u011frenir. A\u015f\u0131k oldu\u011fu \u00f6\u011fretmeni ve \"ilkini \u00e7ald\u0131\u011f\u0131\" k\u0131z ile, Natsuo kendini beklenmedik bir a\u015fk \u00fc\u00e7geninin ortas\u0131nda bulur."}

name: Whimsy Whimsy Witch
description: {"en":"A prince has been cursed to turn into a frog by a witch. Things went wild from there.","vi":"M\u1ed9t ho\u00e0ng t\u1eed b\u1ecb bi\u1ebfn th\u00e0nh con \u1ebfch b\u1edfi m\u1ed9t m\u1ee5 ph\u00f9 th\u1ee7y. Chuy\u1ec7n di\u1ec5n ra ti\u1ebfp theo kh\u00e1 l\u00e0 k\u00ec c\u1ee5c.","pt-br":"Um pr\u00edncipe foi amaldi\u00e7oado por uma bruxa e transformado em um sapo. A partir da\u00ed, as coisas sa\u00edram completamente de controle."}

name: Charlotte
description: {"en":"In an alternate world, a small percentage of children are able to manifest superpowers upon reaching puberty. Yuu Otosaka, a boy who awakens the ability to temporarily possess others, hopes to use his power to live an easy going high school life.","pt-br":"Embora superficialmente Yuu Otosaka pare\u00e7a ser apenas mais um adolescente charmoso e inteligente, ele tem um segredo - ele tem a habilidade de entrar na mente das pessoas e controlar totalmente seu corpo por cinco segundos de cada vez. Yuu tem usado essa habilidade h\u00e1 anos para obter as notas mais altas, o que lhe permitiu entrar em um col\u00e9gio de prest\u00edgio. Quando a enigm\u00e1tica Nao Tomori pega Yuu usando seu poder, ela o for\u00e7a a se transferir para a Academia Hoshinoumi, uma escola para alunos com habilidades sobrenaturais. O conselho estudantil da escola, liderado por Nao, tem a tarefa de rastrear secretamente adolescentes que abusam de seus poderes. Yuu \u00e9 for\u00e7ado a se juntar ao conselho estudantil e, juntos, eles enfrentam desafios formid\u00e1veis \u200b\u200bque o aproximam da chocante verdade de que sua pr\u00f3pria habilidade, aparentemente incompleta, pode ser mais poderosa do que ele jamais poderia ter imaginado. Uma hist\u00f3ria original de Jun Maeda, criador de Angel Beats! e Clannad, Charlotte explora a vida sobrenatural desses adolescentes e o pre\u00e7o que eles devem pagar por serem especiais."}

name: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Sister Home Alone
description:
{"en":"The Kaede arc of "Rascal" series, Dengeki Bunko's popular works, serialized as manga!

Another day of house-sitting for Azusagawa Kaede. As long as her beloved onii-chan is by her side, she was fine with staying home all day, but a desire to change has started growing in her mind...
Experience the adolescence story, with Kaede as the main character, in a way only possible through manga.

*From ComicWalker, translated*","pt-br":"O arco Kaede da série "Rascal", obras populares da Dengeki Bunko, serializadas como mangá!

Mais um dia de cuidar da casa para Azusagawa Kaede. Enquanto seu amado irmão mais velho estiver ao seu lado, ela está bem em ficar em casa o dia todo, mas um desejo de mudança começou a crescer em sua mente...
Experimente a história da adolescência, com Kaede como personagem principal, de uma maneira só possível através do mangá."}

name: Super Ball Girls
description: {"en":"Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his \"best\" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...","ja":"\u4eba\u751f\u3067\u81ea\u5206\u306b\u3068\u3063\u3066\u306e\u300c\u4e00\u756a\u300d\u3092\u305a\u3063\u3068\u5fc3\u306b\u3057\u307e\u3044\u7d9a\u3051\u306a\u304c\u3089\u3001\u30c1\u30e7\u30b3\u30ec\u30fc\u30c8\u5de5\u5834\u3067\u306e\u4ed5\u4e8b\u3092\u7d9a\u3051\u308b\u4e00\u597d\u745b\u592a\u3002\u30af\u30ea\u30b9\u30de\u30b9\u306e\u591c\u3001\u5e30\u5b85\u4e2d\u306e\u5f7c\u306f\u6697\u95c7\u304b\u3089\u8ee2\u304c\u308b\u4e0d\u601d\u8b70\u306a\u30b9\u30fc\u30d1\u30fc\u30dc\u30fc\u30eb\u3092\u624b\u306b\u3059\u308b\u3002\u65e5\u5e38\u3078\u306e\u69d8\u3005\u306a\u601d\u3044\u3092\u3076\u3064\u3051\u308b\u3088\u3046\u306b\u3001\u305d\u306e\u30dc\u30fc\u30eb\u3092\u601d\u3044\u5207\u308a\u6295\u3052\u3064\u3051\u305f\u5f7c\u306e\u524d\u306b\u3044\u304d\u306a\u308a\u73fe\u308c\u305f\u306e\u306f\u7406\u60f3\u306e\u300c\u7f8e\u5973\u300d\uff0e\uff0e\uff0e\uff01\uff1f","pt-br":"Ichiyoshi continua trabalhando em uma f\u00e1brica de chocolate, trancando o seu \"melhor\" em seu cora\u00e7\u00e3o. Numa noite de Natal, a caminho de casa, ele encontra uma misteriosa super bola que  cai da escurid\u00e3o..."}

name: REAL PLAY: BERSERKER
description:
{"en":"Due to the virtual reality creation item 'Real Play (Ripple)' rank 1 pro gamer 'Hyun-soo' leaves the gaming scene. Unlike his peers, he despises Ripple and is bullied for it, spending his days barely getting by working part time jobs. Thanks to his friend who pities him, he reluctantly begins to play Ripple. With his reaction times from his days as 1 frame, and the strength of a berserker, he becomes the focus of attention.","ko":"가상현실 구현 아이템 `리얼 플레이(리플)‘ 때문에 세계 1위 프로게이머 자리를 내려놓은 '현수'는 친구들과 달리 리플을 거부하여 왕따를 당하고 알바로 근근이 돈을 벌어 살아간다.
​
이를 안타깝게 여긴 절친의 권유로 마지못해 리플을 시작하게 되고
1 프레임 단위로 반응하는 반사 신경과 동체시력 그리고 광전사 같은 힘으로 화제의 주인공이 되는데…."}

name: Boushoku no Berserk: Ore Dake Level to iu Gainen wo Toppa Shite Saikyou
description: {"en":"In this world, there are two types of people. Those Who have powerful \u201cskills\u201d, and those who don\u2019t. People born with powerful skills, exterminate monsters to level up and become successful, while people without them, become failures, who are treated harshly by society. Follow the story of Fate, a guy who works as a gatekeeper, and whose only skill is gluttony, a skill that only makes him hungry."}

name: Joban de Shinu Saikyou no Sub Chara ni Tensei Shita no de, Game Chishiki de Musou Suru
The Top Dungeon Farmer
description: {"en":"Sejun, your average Seoul underdog, didn\u2019t expect to grow tomatoes full-time when he stumbled into the mysterious dungeon full of monster quests and extravagant rewards. Yet, there he was, as a farmer growing and selling cash crops while clearing numerous quests that came his way. Will Sejun make it out of the dungeon with the plush rewards he hoped for? At least he has what it takes: optimism, resourcefulness, and a group of loyal furry friends.","it":"Un giorno, una misteriosa torre apparve improvvisamente in citt\u00e0. La gente decise di chiamarla dungeon, e sebbene fosse pieno di asperit\u00e0 e mostri pericolosi, era anche una terra di opportunit\u00e0, dove erano in attesa innumerevoli tesori. Quando Sejun, un giovane che vive una vita normale, viene invitato per caso nel dungeon sotterraneo, \u00e8 entusiasta all'idea di diventare ricco, ma \u00e8 rimasto bloccato in una zona nascosta della torre misteriosa. Tutto quello che ha sono alcuni semi e il suo corpo. Ora Sejun deve coltivare, raccogliere risorse e capire come sopravvivere!","es-la":"Un d\u00eda, una torre misteriosa apareci\u00f3 de repente en la ciudad. La gente decidi\u00f3 llamarla mazmorra, y aunque estaba llena de un terreno irregular y monstruos peligrosos, tambi\u00e9n era una tierra de oportunidades, donde aguardaban innumerables tesoros. Cuando Sejun, un joven que vive una vida ordinaria, es invitado por casualidad a la mazmorra, est\u00e1 emocionado ante la perspectiva de hacerse rico, pero se encuentra varado en un \u00e1rea oculta de la misteriosa torre. Todo lo que tiene son unas pocas semillas y su cuerpo. \u00a1Ahora, Sejun debe cultivar, recolectar recursos y descubrir su propia estrategia de supervivencia!","pt-br":"Sejun, o t\u00edpico azar\u00e3o de Seul n\u00e3o esperava se tornar um Fazendeiro quando trope\u00e7ou e foi transportado para a famosa Dungeon, cheia de miss\u00f5es, de monstros e recompensas misteriosas. No entanto, l\u00e1 estava ele, como um agricultor cultivando e vendendo seus frutos engenhosamente, enquanto conclu\u00eda in\u00fameras miss\u00f5es que surgiam em seu caminho. Ser\u00e1 que Sejun conseguir\u00e1 sair da Dungeon que est\u00e1 preso? Pelo menos ele tem o que \u00e9 necess\u00e1rio: otimismo, engenhosidade e um grupo de leais amigos peludinhos."}

name: Isekai Izakaya "Nobu"
description:
{"en":"Imagine there is a bar with many weird kind of food and drink that might bring you to another world! The bar, so-called "Nobu" is located in a alley of the old city Aiteria. At the very first step, diners feels like falling into another completely country, with cold, super cool beer, so-called "Toriaezu Nama"! (from: MU)  
  
Adapted from [web novel (raw)]( / light novel of same name.  

[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](

- [Wikipedia]("}

name: The Archmage's Restaurant
description:
{"en":"A man who reincarnated in another world as a 9th class wizard and retired after saving the continent from a dragon war. He decides to open a small restaurant in the countryside, but his routine is anything but ordinary. 

On the second floor of his restaurant, there lives a black dragon who has transformed into a woman, named Rurin. She is greedy, cute and loyal to him, but also ignorant and clueless about the human world. 

They live a fun and warm life, serving customers, solving problems and growing violets in the garden.","ko":"요리사를 꿈꾸던 내가 사고로 이세계에 떨어졌다.

몬스터와 마법이 넘쳐나는 판타지 세계이지만 여기라고 식당을 못할 건 없잖아?

그러나 전쟁으로 인해 이세계에 들어오자마자 군대에 끌려가게 되고,
..."}

name: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi
description: {"en":"Mukouda Tsuyoshi has been summoned from modern Japan to a different world of sword and magic. He eagerly thought of what kind of a huge adventure was waiting for him, but actually, Mukouda is just a civilian who got caught in a Hero Summoning. On top of that, Mukouda\u2019s base status is shabby compared to the legitimate heroes.\r\nSuspecting the king of foul play, as he's morbidly obese in a kingdom in crisis, apart from being war-happy, Mukouda decides to leave the castle by presenting his lack of martial prowess. The only thing that Mukouda can rely on in this world is his unique skill Net Supermarket, that can only order goods from modern Japan\u2019s internet to the new world.","es":"Mukouda Tuyoshi ha sido invocado desde el Jap\u00f3n contempor\u00e1neo a un mundo fant\u00e1stico de espadas y magia. Con ansia se emocion\u00f3 con la gran aventura que le esperaba, pero Mukouda es solo un civil que fue tra\u00eddo por accidente durante la Invocaci\u00f3n del H\u00e9roe. Aparte de todo, el nivel b\u00e1sico de Mukouda es mediocre comparado con el de los verdaderos h\u00e9roes. Sospechando de malas intenciones por parte del rey, el cual es m\u00f3rbidamente obeso en un reino en crisis aparte de ser aficionado a la guerra, Mukouda decide dejar el castillo argumentando su falta de capacidad de combate. El \u00fanico factor con el cual Mukouda cuenta en este mundo es su habilidad \"Supermercado de Red\" que solamente puede ordenar bienes del internet del Jap\u00f3n moderno al nuevo mundo.","vi":"Mukouda Tsuyomi, m\u1ed9t ch\u00e0ng trai Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tri\u1ec7u h\u1ed3i sang th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi c\u1ee7a ki\u1ebfm v\u00e0 ma thu\u1eadt... C\u1ee9 t\u01b0\u1edfng s\u1ebd c\u00f3 nh\u1eefng chuy\u1ebfn phi\u00eau l\u01b0u v\u0129 \u0111\u1ea1i \u0111ang ch\u1edd \u0111\u1ee3i m\u00ecnh nh\u01b0ng th\u1ef1c ra Makouda ch\u1ec9 l\u00e0 m\u1ed9t th\u01b0\u1eddng d\u00e2n b\u1ecb d\u00ednh v\u00e0o l\u1ec5 [Tri\u1ec7u h\u1ed3i Anh H\u00f9ng]. Nh\u1eadn ra b\u1ea3n ch\u1ea5t th\u1eadt s\u1ef1 c\u1ee7a vi\u1ec7c tri\u1ec7u h\u1ed3i anh h\u00f9ng, Makouda \u0111\u00e3 r\u1eddi \u0111i v\u00e0 t\u1ef1 sinh s\u1ed1ng t\u1ea1i th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi m\u1edbi v\u1edbi skill \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111\u00e1o [Si\u00eau th\u1ecb tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn]. V\u00e0 tr\u00ean h\u1ebft, h\u00e0ng lo\u1ea1t nh\u1eefng k\u1ebb k\u1ef3 l\u1ea1 b\u1ecb thu h\u00fat b\u1edfi th\u1ee9c \u0103n t\u1eeb th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i \u0111\u00e3 xu\u1ea5t hi\u1ec7n. T\u1eeb \u0111\u00f3 cu\u1ed9c phi\u00eau l\u01b0u c\u1ee7a anh ch\u00e0ng b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u."}

name: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi: Sui no Daibouken
description: {"en":"A spin-off of the series TONDEMO SKILL DE ISEKAI HOUROU MESHI told from Sui's perspective."}

name: Tanbo de Hirotta Onna Kishi, Inaka de Ore no Yome da to Omowareteiru
description: {"en":"Jin Mita, a farmer living in a small countryside town, discovers an unconscious female knight in his rice field one morning. She calls herself Seraphim, and she seems to have come from another world. She has no knowledge of this world and nowhere to go. Unable to bear seeing her like this, Jin offered to take her in, but apparently the people around him think that Seraphim is his wife...!?\n\n(Source: Magazine Pocket)","ja":"\u5c0f\u3055\u306a\u7530\u820e\u753a\u3067\u8fb2\u5bb6\u3068\u3057\u3066\u66ae\u3089\u3059\u4e09\u7530\u4ec1\u306f\u3001\u3042\u308b\u671d\u81ea\u5206\u306e\u7530\u3093\u307c\u306b\u5973\u9a0e\u58eb\u304c\u5012\u308c\u3066\u3044\u308b\u306e\u3092\u767a\u898b\u3059\u308b\u3002\u30bb\u30e9\u30d5\u30a3\u30e0\u3068\u540d\u4e57\u308b\u5f7c\u5973\u306f\u3001\u3069\u3046\u3084\u3089\u7570\u4e16\u754c\u304b\u3089\u3084\u3063\u3066\u6765\u305f\u3089\u3057\u3044\u3002\u3053\u306e\u4e16\u754c\u306e\u77e5\u8b58\u3082\u306a\u304f\u884c\u304d\u5834\u3082\u306a\u3044\u3002\u305d\u3093\u306a\u5f7c\u5973\u3092\u898b\u304b\u306d\u3066\u4e00\u7dd2\u306b\u66ae\u3089\u3059\u3053\u3068\u3092\u63d0\u6848\u3059\u308b\u3082\u3001\u3069\u3046\u3084\u3089\u5468\u308a\u304b\u3089\u306f\u30bb\u30e9\u30d5\u30a3\u30e0\u304c\u4ffa\u306e\u5ac1\u3060\u3068\u601d\u308f\u308c\u3066\u308b\u3088\u3046\u3067\u2026!? \u304a\u65e5\u69d8\u306e\u4e0b\u306e\u8fb2\u4f5c\u696d\u3068\u65b0\u9bae\u7d20\u6750\u306e\u304a\u6599\u7406\u3002\u305d\u3057\u3066\u7f8e\u4eba\u5973\u9a0e\u58eb\u3068\u9001\u308b\u3001\u306e\u3093\u3073\u308a\u7530\u820e\u30b9\u30ed\u30fc\u30e9\u30a4\u30d5\u958b\u5e55\uff01","vi":"M\u1ed9t ng\u00e0y n\u1ecd, t\u00f4i ra th\u0103m ru\u1ed9ng, th\u00ec v\u00f4 t\u00ecnh g\u1eb7p m\u1ed9t n\u1eef hi\u1ec7p s\u0129 \u0111ang n\u1eb1m trong b\u00e3i ru\u1ed9ng nh\u00e0 t\u00f4i. C\u00f4 ta t\u1ef1 x\u01b0ng l\u00e0 Seraphim, l\u00e0 k\u1ecb s\u0129 t\u1edbi t\u1eeb m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ebf qu\u1ed1c vi\u1ec5n t\u01b0\u1edfng n\u00e0o \u0111\u00f3. C\u00f3 v\u1ebb nh\u01b0 c\u00f4 \u1ea5y n\u00f3i th\u1eadt, v\u00ec c\u00f4 ta kh\u00f4ng c\u00f3 b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 ki\u1ebfn th\u1ee9c g\u00ec v\u1ec1 th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi n\u00e0y. Do kh\u00f4ng th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ec3 m\u1eb7c c\u00f4 \u1ea5y nh\u01b0 v\u1eady, t\u00f4i \u0111\u00e0nh \u0111\u01b0a c\u00f4 \u1ea5y v\u1ec1 nh\u00e0 ch\u0103m s\u00f3c. V\u00e0 do \u1edf v\u00f9ng qu\u00ea ng\u01b0\u1eddi ta bi\u1ebft h\u1ebft d\u00f9 ch\u1ec9 l\u00e0 m\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 thay \u0111\u1ed5i nh\u1ecf nh\u1ea5t, ng\u01b0\u1eddi ta b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u \u0111\u1ed3n c\u00f4 \u1ea5y l\u00e0 v\u1ee3 t\u00f4i..."}

name: The Daily Life of a Middle-Aged Online Shopper in Another World
description:
{"en":"Kenichi, a single man in his 40s, is transported into another world for no apparent reason. As he tries to escape a dangerous forest teaming with monsters, he realizes he has the power to access to a huge online store. By using this power to exchange goods he found in this new world for cash, and then buying modern ones off the internet, he was able to quickly create a very popular business. However, his goal is to have a slow and leisurely life. Instead of growing his business even more, he decides to settle down and live off of the power of Jeff Bezos.
___
[web novel]( (jp)","ja":"突如異世界に転移してしまったアラフォーの独身男ケンイチ。訳もわからぬまま、異世界の危険な森を進んでいく中で、巨大ネット通販サイトが使えることに気がつく。ケンイチはそのチート能力を使い、異世界でのスローライフを目指す…！","ru":"История о мужчине средних лет, который делает все, что хочет, с помощью покупок в Интернете в один клик!","pt-br":"A história de um homem de meia idade fazendo o que quiser com o poder das compras online com um clique!
Kenichi, um homem solteiro de 40 anos, é transportado para outro mundo sem motivo aparente. Enquanto ele tenta escapar de uma floresta perigosa se unindo a monstros, ele percebe que tem o poder de acessar uma enorme loja online."}

name: Rosario to Vampire Season II
description:
{"en":"The story continues where the first season left off only months into the future. Yuokai Gakuen has been repaired and the new semester is underway. Tsukune and gang are back, and more powerful then ever. Anti-Thesis's true identity is relieved. With new adversaries looming on the horizon, and something much more sinister then the gang has ever faced before.   
  
Tsukune is battling with the monster inside him. With the help of Moka, Mizore, Kurumu, Ruby, and Yukari. Tsukune trains to get his vampire blood under control and the strength to protect what he holds dear.  
  
The new season focuses more on the girls, their past, and their families. New confrontations await them. New friends and allies will join them by their side. Together they will discover the secrets of Moka's rosary, and her lineage…  
  


---","es":"La historia continúa donde la primera temporada dejó sólo unos meses en el futuro. Yuokai Gakuen ha sido reparado y el nuevo semestre está en marcha. Tsukune y su pandilla están de vuelta, y son más poderosos que nunca. La verdadera identidad de Anti-Tesis es relevada. Con nuevos adversarios que se avecinan en el horizonte, y algo mucho más siniestro de lo que la pandilla ha enfrentado antes.   
  
Tsukune está luchando con el monstruo que lleva dentro. Con la ayuda de Moka, Mizore, Kurumu, Ruby y Yukari. Tsukune se entrena para tener su sangre de vampiro bajo control y la fuerza para proteger lo que más quiere.  
  
La nueva temporada se centra más en las chicas, su pasado y sus familias. Nuevos enfrentamientos les esperan. Nuevos amigos y aliados se les unirán a su lado. Juntos descubrirán los secretos del rosario de Moka, y su linaje…","tr":"İlk sezonun kaldığı yerden sadece aylar sonra devam ediyor. Yuokai Okulu onarılmış ve yeni dönem başlamıştır. Tsukune ve çetesi geri dönmüştür ve her zamankinden daha güçlüdür. Anti-Thesis'in gerçek kimliği ortaya çıktı. Ufukta beliren yeni düşmanlar ve çetenin daha önce karşılaştığından çok daha kötü bir şey var.  Tsukune içindeki canavarla savaşıyor. Moka, Mizore, Kurumu, Ruby ve Yukari'nin yardımıyla. Tsukune, vampir kanını kontrol altına almak ve değer verdiği şeyleri koruyacak gücü elde etmek için antrenman yapıyor.    Yeni sezon daha çok kızlara, geçmişlerine ve ailelerine odaklanıyor. Onları yeni yüzleşmeler bekliyor. Yanlarına yeni arkadaşlar ve müttefikler katılacak. Birlikte Moka'nın kolyesinin ve soyunun sırlarını keşfedecekler...","pt-br":"A história continua onde a primeira temporada parou apenas alguns meses no futuro. Youkai Gakuen foi reparado e o novo semestre está em andamento.

Tsukune ea gangue estão de volta, e mais poderoso do que nunca. A verdadeira identidade de Anti-Tese é aliviada. Com os novos adversários que se desenham no horizonte, e algo muito mais sinistro que a gangue já enfrentou antes. Tsukune está lutando com o monstro dentro dele. Com a ajuda de Moka, Mizore, Kurumu, Ruby, e Yukari. Tsukune treina para obter o seu sangue de vampiro sob controle e a força para proteger o que ele tanto preza.

A nova temporada se concentra mais nas meninas, o seu passado, e suas famílias. Novos confrontos esperam. Novos amigos e aliados vão se juntar a eles por seu lado. Juntos, eles vão descobrir os segredos do rosário de Moka, e a sua linhagem..."}

name: Rosario to Vampire
description:
{"en":"The story revolves around Tsukune Aono, a boy who accidentally gets enrolled in a school inhabited by monsters and demons. He quickly befriends Moka Akashiya, a vampire who soon develops an obsession with his blood, and later meets other girls who soon take a romantic liking to him.  


---","es":"La historia gira en torno a Tsukune Aono, un niño que accidentalmente se matricula en una escuela habitada por monstruos y demonios. Rápidamente se hace amigo de Moka Akashiya, un vampiro que pronto desarrolla una obsesión con su sangre, y luego conoce a otras chicas que pronto le toman un cariño romántico.  


---","it":"La storia ruota attorno a Tsukune Aono, un ragazzo che viene accidentalmente iscritto a una scuola abitata da mostri e demoni. Fa presto amicizia con Moka Akashiya, un vampiro che sviluppa presto un'ossessione per il suo sangue, e in seguito incontra altre ragazze che presto lo prendono in simpatia (romantica).  


---","pl":"Tsukune Aono oblał wszystkie egzaminy wstępne do szkół średnich. W akcie desperacji jego rodzice zapisali go do tajemniczej szkoły, oddalonej od wszelkich ludzkich siedlisk i innych przejawów cywilizacji. Na dodatek na miejsce przywiózł go jakiś straszny autobus, z kierowcą z piekła rodem, a to był tylko początek. Wkrótce poznaje nowych ludzi (a raczej nowe koleżanki), które wyróżniają się czymś szczególnym. Czym? Przeczytajcie, aby się dowiedzieć!","tr":"Hikaye, yanlışlıkla canavarların ve iblislerin yaşadığı bir okula kaydolan bir çocuk olan Tsukune Aono'nun etrafında dönüyor. Kısa süre sonra kanına karşı bir saplantı geliştiren bir vampir olan Moka Akashiya ile arkadaş olur ve daha sonra kendisinden romantik bir şekilde hoşlanan diğer kızlarla tanışır."}

name: Sword Art Online - Mother's Rosario
description: {"en":"While Asuna, Leafa, Silica and Lisbeth were doing their homework in Kirito and Asuna's Log House on the 22nd Floor of New Aincrad, Lisbeth informed Asuna of a player known as Absolute Sword who was challenging players on the 24th Floor, while offering an 11-hit Original Sword Skill as a reward. Asuna was told that the mysterious player had actually converted from a different game and that over thirty players who had attempted to challenge the player, including Leafa and even Kirito, were defeated. Hearing that Kirito had said something to the player before being defeated and not sharing what he had said with the others and thinking that the mysterious player had come for a reason, Asuna decided to challenge the player as well. To her surprise, the player was actually a girl, named Yuuki.","pt-br":"A batalha de Kirito e Sinon contra Death Gun acaba, por\u00e9m algumas semanas ap\u00f3s o ocorrido, algo estranho anda acontecendo em Alfheim Online. Uma nova duelista com uma espada customizada est\u00e1 derrotando todos os jogadores do MMO, incluindo Kirito! Mas quando Asuna se encontra com esta duelista, ela recebe algo que nunca esperava: um convite para se juntar a uma guilda exclusiva! Mas quais s\u00e3o os objetivos deles? O arco Mother\u2019s Rosario tem in\u00edcio!"}

name: Death March kara Hajimaru Isekai Kyousoukyoku
description: {"en":"29-year-old programmer Suzuki Ichirou finds himself transported into a fantasy RPG. Within the game, he's a 15-year-old named Satou. At first he thinks he's dreaming, but his experiences seem very real. Due to his use of a 3-time-use special power (meteor shower), he ends up wiping out an army of lizardmen and becoming very high level. He hides his level and plans to live peacefully and meet new people, though developments in the game story (like the return of a demon king) might get in his way.","ja":"\u30c7\u30b9\u30de\u30fc\u30c1\u771f\u3063\u53ea\u4e2d\u306e\u30d7\u30ed\u30b0\u30e9\u30de\u30fc\u3001\u201d\u30b5\u30c8\u30a5\u30fc\u201d\u3053\u3068\u9234\u6728\u3002\u4eee\u7720\u3092\u53d6\u3063\u3066\u3044\u305f\u306f\u305a\u306e\u5f7c\u306f\u3001\u6c17\u304c\u3064\u3051\u3070\u898b\u305f\u3053\u3068\u3082\u306a\u3044\u7570\u4e16\u754c\u306b\u653e\u308a\u51fa\u3055\u308c\u3001\u305d\u3057\u3066\u76ee\u306e\u524d\u306b\u306f\u8725\u8734\u4eba\u306e\u5927\u8ecd\uff1f","vi":"Suzuki, m\u1ed9t l\u1eadp tr\u00ecnh vi\u00ean tr\u01b0\u1edfng th\u00e0nh, sau khi th\u1ee9c d\u1eady \u0111\u1ed9t nhi\u00ean nh\u1eadn ra r\u1eb1ng c\u1eadu b\u1ecb tri\u1ec7u h\u1ed3i v\u00e0o 1 th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi kh\u00e1c khi \u0111ang m\u1eb7c m\u1ed9t b\u1ed9 qu\u1ea7n \u00e1o b\u00ecnh th\u01b0\u1eddng \u1edf c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ed9 1. C\u1eadu \u0111\u1ea1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ed9 cao v\u00e0 kho b\u00e1u sau khi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng ph\u00e9p thu\u1eadt-s\u1eb5n-c\u00f3-3 l\u1ea7n, M\u01b0a Thi\u00ean Th\u1ea1ch, ch\u1ec9 v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n v\u00e0 l\u00ean c\u1ea5p th\u00e1nh . Sau \u0111\u00f3 vi\u1ec7c c\u1eadu d\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ecbnh l\u00e0m \u1edf th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi kh\u00e1c l\u00e0 m\u1ed9t \u201cchuy\u1ebfn du h\u00e0nh tham th\u00fa ng\u1eafm c\u1ea3nh\u201d?\nG\u1eb7p g\u1ee1 ba c\u00f4 g\u00e1i ng\u01b0\u1eddi th\u00fa, hai ch\u1ecb em g\u00e1i xinh \u0111\u1eb9p v\u1edbi m\u00e1i t\u00f3c t\u00edm & \u0111en c\u00f9ng m\u1ed9t c\u00f4 g\u00e1i y\u00eau tinh t\u00f3c v\u00e0ng k\u00ec d\u1ecb v\u00e0 v\u1edbi r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi tr\u00ean chuy\u1ebfn du h\u00e0nh c\u1ee7a c\u1eadu sau n\u00e0y xu\u1ea5t hi\u1ec7n r\u1ed3i gia nh\u1eadp d\u00e0n HAREM. D\u00f9 ph\u1ea3i chi\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ea5u v\u1edbi ma qu\u00e1i v\u00e0 ch\u00faa qu\u1ef7, \u0111\u00e2y v\u1eabn l\u00e0 c\u00e2u chuy\u1ec7n vi\u1ec5n t\u01b0\u1edfng \u1ea5m \u00e1p x\u00fac \u0111\u1ed9ng.","pt-br":"Suzuki Ichirou \u00e9 um programado de 29 anos que subitamente fora levado a um mundo diferente, trajando apenas roupas comum e no level 1. Ele obteve um n\u00edvel elevado e in\u00fameros tesouros ap\u00f3s utilizar 3 vezes uma habilidade descart\u00e1vel, [Meteor Shower], chuva de meteoros. Ap\u00f3s superar essa crise, ele decidiu realizar um \"Turismo em outro mundo? Superando adversidades, fazendo amigos, obtendo companheiros, ocasionalmente derrotando dem\u00f4nios, lordes dem\u00f4nios e pessoas mal-intencionadas, Satou aproveita o seu dia-a-dia nesta calorosa hist\u00f3ria de fantasia."}

name: Death March kara Hajimaru Isekai Koufukukyoku
description: {"en":"Death March Kara Hajimaru Isekai Kyousoukyoku Series spin-off manga, where Lulu Watari is the protagonist.  Come taste the delicious homemade food of Lulu, disciple of the renowned [Chief of Miracles] Satou Pendragon!","pt-br":"Mang\u00e1 Spin-off da S\u00e9rie Death March Kara Hajimaru Isekai Kyousoukyoku, onde Lulu Watari \u00e9 a protagonista. Venha saborear a deliciosa comida caseira de Lulu, disc\u00edpula do renomado [Chefe dos Milagres] Satou Pendragon!"}

name: Death March Kara Hajimaru Isekai Kyousoukyoku – Comic Anthology
description:
{"en":"An anthology of comics depicting the world of "Death March" by gorgeous manga artists!

Why don't you take a tour of the world of "Death March" with the gorgeous manga artists...? A cute, fun, and energetic welcome from characters full of individuality! The long-awaited comic anthology of "Death March" fans is here! 

(Source: Book Walker, Machine Translated)","ja":"「デスマ」の世界観を豪華執筆陣が描くコミックアンソロジー！

「デスマ」の世界を豪華執筆陣と一緒に異世界観光しませんか…？個性溢れるキャラクター達が、可愛く、楽しく、元気よくお出迎え！「デスマ」ファン待望のコミックアンソロジーここに開幕!!

(Source: Book Walker)","pt-br":"Uma coleção de histórias desenhadas por renomados artistas! Gostaria de conhecer o fantástico mundo de Death March na visão de outros mangakás como Botsuraku Yotei, Blood  e Maou wo Daimadoushi? Um universo com personagens fofos, carismáticos e cheio de personalidades está aqui! A tão esperada Antologia de Death March!"}

name: Suufungo no Mirai ga Wakaru You ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro wa Wakaranai.
description:
{"en":"Arase Itou has the ability to see a few minutes into the future, but the glimpses he sees are always linked to misfortune. With his kind-hearted nature, Arata decides to use this inconvenient power to help girls facing various troubles and prevent their unfortunate futures. However, Arase doesn't realize that, little by little, the girls are growing fond of him. And he remains oblivious to the quiet rivalries forming between them over his attention.","id":"Arase Itou bisa melihat beberapa menit ke depan. Namun, masa depan yang ia lihat selalu berhubungan dengan masalah. Arase yang baik hati berusaha menghindari masa depan yang tidak menyenangkan ini, namun pada akhirnya masalah tersebut tetap membuatnya membantu berbagai gadis dengan masalah mereka. Tanpa ia sadari, para gadis mulai menyukainya. Arase tidak menyadari bahwa, diam-diam, para gadis bersaing untuk memperebutkannya.","ja":"伊藤新世は数分後の未来が分かる。ただし視える未来は不幸につながるもの。
お人好しな新世はそんな不都合な未来を回避し、様々な悩みを持つ少女を助けることになる。
新世は知らない。いつの間にか、少女たちに好かれていることに。
新世は気づかない。人知れず、少女たちが争っていることに。","vi":"Arata Itou có khả năng nhìn thấy trước vài phút trong tương lai, nhưng những hình ảnh cậu thấy luôn gắn liền với xui xẻo. Là một người tốt bụng, Arata quyết định tận dụng năng lực "bất tiện" này để giúp đỡ các cô gái đang gặp khó khăn và ngăn chặn những điều không may sẽ xảy ra với họ. Thế nhưng, cậu hoàn toàn không nhận ra rằng các cô gái ngày càng có tình cảm với mình. Càng không hay biết về những "cuộc chiến ngầm" giữa họ để giành lấy sự chú ý của cậu.","pt-br":"Arata Itou tem a habilidade de ver alguns minutos no futuro, mas as visões que ele tem estão sempre ligadas a infortúnios. Com seu coração bondoso, Arata decide usar esse poder inconveniente para ajudar as garotas que enfrentam diversos problemas e evitar seus futuros infelizes. No entanto, Arata não percebe que, pouco a pouco, as garotas começam a se afeiçoar a ele. E ele continua alheio às rivalidades silenciosas que estão se formando entre elas por causa da sua atenção."}

name: Yoku Wakaranai Keredo Isekai ni Tensei Shiteita You Desu
description:
{"en":"Ren, a young orphan girl, has been sold off to a merchant with sinister plans for her. Suddenly, memories of her past life on a world called Earth come flooding back, and Ren remembers that she used to be a research scientist – and a grown man! As Ren escapes into the Dark Forest, magical powers awaken within her. In order to survive the harsh realities of this world, she must use her rekindled knowledge of Earth's science as well as her newfound powers! Will her magical cheat powers and past-life knowledge be enough to keep her freedom, or is she doomed to a life of servitude?
___
**Character Designer:** [Kaoming](","ja":"「私、おっさんだった！！」

孤児の少女・レンは身売りされる途中で、前世の記憶を取り戻す。レンの前世は、三十代の男性研究者だったが、転生して今まで孤児として生きていたのであった。レンは、その身に秘められた魔法の才能と、前世の科学的知識を駆使して、ひとり過酷な異世界を生き抜いていく。"}

name: Undead Girl Murder Farce
description: {"en":"Vampires, a supernatural detective, and a girl's head in a birdcage, oh my! The mysterious game is afoot in Victorian England in this atmospheric supernatural story that's sure to keep you on your toes!"}

name: Monogatari no Kuromaku ni Tensei shite
description:
{"en":"There was a globally popular game called *The Legend of the Seven Heroes*. Ren cleared the sequel of that game at the fastest record in the world, and thus he obtained a bonus special data. However, no matter where he looked inside the game, he could not find the data. The moment where Ren was about to give up the search, he decided to start playing the second round of the game.

Suddenly, a notification message “Do you want to start a special story?" appeared on the screen.

When Ren chose “Yes” without hesitation, he lost consciousness, and when he woke up, he was a baby. —Could it be that he was reincarnated as one of the heroes in *The Legend of the Seven Heroes*? Ren, who thought such a thing was impossible, could not believe his ears when he heard his name from his mother's mouth. It was the name of a classmate who betrays the heroes in the middle of the story.

Of course, he wishes to live in peace. But he meets a saint whose life he's supposed to take, and doesn't. Furthermore, he ends up saving a character (the boss of a great noble family) who was supposed to die. All of these things creates a development that he doesn't know about coming to play…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](  [Syosetu](","ja":"大人気ゲーム『七英雄の伝説』。その続編を世界最速でクリアした大学生・蓮は、ゲームの中に転生してしまう。 しかし、主人公に転生したかと思いきや、彼が転生したのは主人公たちを裏切る黒幕的強キャラだった！","pt-br":"Havia um jogo globalmente popular chamado “The Legend of the Seven Heroes”.
Ren finalizou a sequência desse jogo com o recorde mais rápido do mundo e, assim, obteve um bônus especial de dados.
No entanto, não importa onde ele olhou dentro do jogo, ele não conseguiu encontrar os dados.
No momento em que Ren estava prestes a desistir da busca, ele decidiu começar a jogar a segunda rodada do jogo.
De repente, uma mensagem de notificação “Deseja iniciar uma história especial?” aparece na tela.
Quando Ren escolhe “Sim” sem hesitar, ele perde a consciência e, quando acorda, era um bebê. —-
Será que ele reencarnou como um dos heróis em “The Legend of the Seven Heroes”?
Ren, que pensava que tal coisa era impossível, não podia acreditar em seus ouvidos quando ouviu seu nome da boca de sua mãe.
Era o nome de um colega de classe que trai os heróis no meio da história.
Claro, ele deseja viver em paz.
Mas no jogo, ele conhece uma santa cuja vida ele deveria tirar, e não o faz.
Além disso, ele acaba salvando um personagem (o chefe de uma grande família nobre) que deveria morrer.
Todas essas coisas criam um desenvolvimento que ele não sabe jogar…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](  [Syosetu]("}

name: Kekkon Yubiwa Monogatari
description:
{"en":"Satou has been in love with his childhood friend and neighbour, Hime, ever since she and her grandfather appeared out of nowhere 10 years ago. Now a dazzling, yet mysterious high-school beauty, she makes it more and more difficult for him to confess his feelings. As the anniversary of their first meeting is nearing, will he muster up his courage to transform their friendship into something more? Or will an entirely different fate await this tightly bonded pair?","it":"Sato è innamorato della sua amica d'infanzia e vicina di casa, Hime, da quando lei e suo nonno apparvero dal nulla dieci anni prima. Ora è un'affascinante, e misteriosa bellezza delle superiori, e questo rende molto più difficile per lui confessare i suoi sentimenti. Mentre l'anniversario del loro primo incontro si avvicina, raccoglierà il coraggio che gli serve per trasformare la loro amicizia in qualcosa di più? O un fato completamente differente questa coppia legatissima?","ja":"幼馴染みのヒメから別れを告げられた男子高校生・サトウ。ヒメを追いかけてたどり着いたのは、なんとファンタジー世界!!　そこでサトウはヒメと結婚し伝説の勇者・指輪王になることに――!!","ru":"Сато — простой японский паренёк, который души не чает в своей подруге детства Химе. Так вышло, что Сато угодил прямиком в иной мир, где ему волею судьбы досталась роль повелителя колец. Женившись на давно любимой подруге детства, казалось бы, чего ещё желать, — но ни тут-то было! Зло не дремлет! И теперь, чтобы одолеть терзающую незнакомый ему мир напасть, ему предстоит женить на себе ещё четырех девиц из разных земель и рас, дабы вобрать в себя их силу и одолеть пробудившееся врага!  
Сможет ли наш повелитель колец исполнить свою роль и стать спасителем иного мира? Это нам и предстоит узнать!  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](","es-la":"Satou ha estado enamorado de su vecina y amiga de la infancia, Himeno, desde que ella y su abuelo aparecieron de la nada en destello de luz hace 10 años. Ahora ella es una deslumbrante, misteriosa, y hermosa estudiante de secundaria y él desea llevar su relación al siguiente nivel, pero justo cuando está a punto de confesar sus sentimientos, ella le dice que debe irse. Él decide que no puede simplemente dejarla ir, así que va tras ella. Sin embargo encontrará algo inesperado, se ve inmerso en un mundo de magia, monstruos y ¡anillos de boda!","pt-br":"Satou é apaixonado por sua amiga de infância e vizinha, Hime, desde que ela e o avô apareceram do nada há 10 anos. Agora uma deslumbrante, mas ainda misteriosa estudante, ela torna mais difícil para Satou confessar seus sentimentos. Com o convite de Hime para ir ao festival de verão, ele vai conseguir reunir coragem para transformar sua amizade em algo mais? Ou aguardará este casal um destino totalmente diferente?"}

name: The Kingdoms of Ruin
description: {"en":"Due to the Gear Expansion, witches who had been friends with the people become unnecessary. Humans, who were afraid of unscientific power, begin a witch hunt\u2026 And a human boy who has his beloved witch killed becomes the \u201cWizard of vengeance\u201d.","pt-br":"Devido \u00e0 Expans\u00e3o da Tecnologia, as bruxas que eram amigas do povo se tornaram desnecess\u00e1rias. Humanos, que temiam o poder n\u00e3o cient\u00edfico, come\u00e7am uma ca\u00e7a \u00e0s bruxas\u2026 E um menino humano que teve sua amada bruxa morta, se torna o \u201cMago da Vingan\u00e7a\u201d."}

name: Dance in the Vampire Bund
description: {"en":"After millennia in hiding, Mina \u0162epe\u015f, the princess of the ancient covenant and ruler of all vampires, wants change. Using the vast wealth of the \u0162epe\u015f line, she has paid off the entire gross national debt of Japan and in so doing, gained the authority to create a \"special district\" off the coast of Japan that is to become the future haven to vampires the world over!   \n  \nNow, on the eve of the landmark press conference announcing the existence of vampires to the world, terrorists and rival factions are plotting to assassinate Mina \u0162epe\u015f before she has a chance to make her world-changing announcement."}

name: Dive in the Vampire Bund
Tsugumomo
description: {"en":"Kazuya Kagami, an ordinary boy, finds his life turned upside down when his late mother's obi transforms into a girl wearing a kimono named Kiriha. She happens to be a Tsukumogami called a \"tsugumomo,\" objects that have gained a soul through long years of harmony with their owners. Kazuya has no recollection of meeting Kiriha when she exclaims \"Long time no see\" to him. He nearly loses his life from an attacking \"amasogi\" that are premature spirits born only to fulfill impure wishes of certain people, and Kiriha defends him. With Kiriha's arrival, Kazuya enters a reality with gods and other Tsukumogami and slowly discovers his dark past.","es":"Los objetos que la gente ha usado durante mucho tiempo, llevan sentimientos en ellos, y se llaman 'tsukumogami'... Kazuya atesora un obi, un recuerdo de su madre, y lo lleva consigo en todo momento, hasta que un d\u00eda es atacado por un misterioso objeto. \u00a1Fue el tsukumogami, Kiriha, quien le salv\u00f3 en ese momento!","ja":"\u4eba\u304c\u9577\u304f\u4f7f\u3044\u7d9a\u3051\u305f\u7269\u306b\u306f\u60f3\u3044\u304c\u5bbf\u308a\u3001\u305d\u308c\u3092\u300c\u4ed8\u55aa\u795e\u300d\u3068\u3044\u3046\u2026\u3002\u6bcd\u306e\u5f62\u898b\u306e\u5e2f\u3092\u5927\u4e8b\u306b\u3057\u3001\u5e38\u306b\u6301\u3061\u6b69\u3044\u3066\u3044\u305f\u4e00\u4e5f\u306f\u3001\u3042\u308b\u65e5\u3001\u4e0d\u53ef\u601d\u8b70\u306a\u7269\u4f53\u306b\u8972\u308f\u308c\u3066\u3057\u307e\u3046\u3002\u305d\u306e\u6642\u306b\u52a9\u3051\u3066\u304f\u308c\u305f\u306e\u306f\u3001\u5e2f\u306e\u4ed8\u55aa\u795e\u30fb\u6850\u8449\u3060\u3063\u305f!!","ru":"\u0414\u0435\u0439\u0441\u0442\u0432\u0438\u0435 \u0441\u044e\u0436\u0435\u0442\u0430 \u0440\u0430\u0437\u0432\u043e\u0440\u0430\u0447\u0438\u0432\u0430\u0435\u0442\u0441\u044f \u0432\u043e\u043a\u0440\u0443\u0433 \u044e\u043d\u043e\u0448\u0438 \u043f\u043e \u0438\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0438 \u041a\u0430\u0434\u0437\u0443\u044f \u041a\u0430\u0433\u0430\u043c\u0438. \u0415\u0433\u043e \u043c\u0430\u0442\u044c \u0434\u0430\u0440\u0438\u0442 \u0435\u043c\u0443 \u043d\u0430 \u043f\u0430\u043c\u044f\u0442\u044c \u043f\u043e\u044f\u0441 \u043e\u0431\u0438 \u0441 \u043c\u043e\u0442\u0438\u0432\u0430\u043c\u0438 \u0441\u0430\u043a\u0443\u0440\u044b, \u0438 \u043e\u0434\u043d\u0430\u0436\u0434\u044b \u0438\u0437 \u044d\u0442\u043e\u0433\u043e \u043f\u043e\u044f\u0441\u0430 \u0432\u043e\u0437\u043d\u0438\u043a\u0430\u0435\u0442 \u0446\u0443\u043a\u043e\u043c\u043e\u0433\u0430\u043c\u0438 \u2014 \u0435\u0433\u043e \u0434\u0443\u0445. \u0421\u0442\u0440\u0430\u043d\u043d\u043e\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0430\u044f \u0433\u043e\u043b\u0443\u0431\u043e\u0432\u043e\u043b\u043e\u0441\u0430\u044f \u0434\u0435\u0432\u0443\u0448\u043a\u0430, \u043f\u0440\u0435\u0434\u0441\u0442\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0432\u0448\u0430\u044f\u0441\u044f \u041a\u0438\u0440\u0438\u0445\u043e\u0439, \u0437\u0430\u044f\u0432\u043b\u044f\u0435\u0442, \u0447\u0442\u043e \u043e\u0442\u043d\u044b\u043d\u0435 \u041a\u0430\u0434\u0437\u0443\u044f \u044f\u0432\u043b\u044f\u0435\u0442\u0441\u044f \u0435\u0451 \u0440\u0430\u0431\u043e\u043c, \u0447\u0442\u043e \u043f\u0440\u0435\u0432\u0440\u0430\u0449\u0430\u0435\u0442 \u0435\u0433\u043e \u0436\u0438\u0437\u043d\u044c \u0432 \u043d\u0430\u0441\u0442\u043e\u044f\u0449\u0435\u0435 \u0438\u0441\u043f\u044b\u0442\u0430\u043d\u0438\u0435.","es-la":"Los objetos que la gente ha usado durante mucho tiempo, llevan sentimientos en ellos, y se llaman 'tsukumogami'... Kazuya atesora un obi, un recuerdo de su madre, y lo lleva consigo en todo momento, hasta que un d\u00eda es atacado por un misterioso objeto. \u00a1Fue el tsukumogami, Kiriha, quien le salv\u00f3 en ese momento!","pt-br":"Kazuya Kagami nunca vai a lugar algum sem o precioso \"Sakura Obi\" que sua m\u00e3e lhe deu. Um dia, uma bela garota, vestida com um Kimono, chamada Kiriha apareceu diante dele. Kiriha naturalmente come\u00e7ou a morar com Kazuya em seu quarto.Ent\u00e3o h\u00e1 Chisato, a amiga de inf\u00e2ncia de Kazuya com \u00f3culos e rabo de cavalo, que se mete em seus assuntos. Logo, h\u00e1 tamb\u00e9m uma irm\u00e3 mais velha superprotetora que parece querer tomar banho com ele. Atrapalhada com enormes peitos, uma sacerdotisa. uma feiticeira com boa apar\u00eancia chamada Kokuyoura, lindas mulheres, garotas picantes e assim come\u00e7a a vida feliz, confusa e embara\u00e7osa de Kazuya!!!"}

name: Uzaki-chan wa Asobitai!
description:
{"en":"Annoying! Cute! But Annoying!  Shinichi Sakurai is a grumpy-faced, athletic and quiet college student who just wants to be left alone,  but he is frequently teased by his cute, stacked underclassman Hana Uzaki, whom he has known since high school.     Sugoi Dekai means something along the lines of "impressively huge."

name: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon: Kanna no Nichijou
Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon
description: {"en":"Kobayashi lives alone in an apartment, until one day, Tooru appears and they end up living together. Tooru looks down on humans as inferior and foolish, but having been saved by Kobayashi-san, she does everything she can to repay the debt and help her with various things, although not everything goes according to plan.","ja":"\u30a2\u30d1\u30fc\u30c8\u306b\u4f4f\u3080\u5c0f\u6797\u3055\u3093\u306e\u3082\u3068\u306b\u3001\u30e1\u30a4\u30c9\u3068\u3057\u3066\u62bc\u3057\u304b\u3051\u3066\u540c\u5c45\u3057\u3066\u3044\u308b\u30c8\u30fc\u30eb\u3002\u30c8\u30fc\u30eb\u306f\u3001\u4eba\u985e\u306e\u3053\u3068\u306f\u57fa\u672c\u3001\u4e0b\u7b49\u3067\u611a\u304b\u3060\u3068\u601d\u3063\u3066\u3044\u308b\u3051\u308c\u3069\u3001\u5c0f\u6797\u3055\u3093\u306b\u306f\u904e\u53bb\u306b\u52a9\u3051\u3066\u3082\u3089\u3063\u305f\u6069\u304c\u3042\u308b\u305f\u3081\u3001\u5168\u529b\u3067\u3054\u5949\u4ed5\u3002\u4eca\u65e5\u3082\u3042\u306e\u624b\u3053\u306e\u624b\u3067\u9811\u5f35\u308b\u306e\u3067\u3057\u305f\u3002","ru":"\u0416\u0438\u043b\u0430 \u0441\u0435\u0431\u0435 \u0438 \u0436\u0438\u043b\u0430 \u041a\u043e\u0431\u0430\u044f\u0448\u0438-\u0441\u0430\u043d. \u041e\u0434\u043d\u0430 \u0432 \u0441\u0432\u043e\u0435\u0439 \u043a\u0432\u0430\u0440\u0442\u0438\u0440\u0435, \u043f\u043e\u043a\u0430 \u043d\u0430 \u043f\u043e\u0440\u043e\u0433\u0435 \u0435\u0451 \u0434\u043e\u043c\u0430 \u043d\u0435 \u043f\u043e\u044f\u0432\u0438\u043b\u0430\u0441\u044c \u0422\u043e\u0440\u0443, \u0443 \u043a\u043e\u0442\u043e\u0440\u043e\u0439 \u0434\u043e\u043b\u0433 \u043f\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0434 \u041a\u043e\u0431\u0430\u044f\u0448\u0438-\u0441\u0430\u043d \u0437\u0430 \u0441\u0432\u043e\u0451 \u0441\u043f\u0430\u0441\u0435\u043d\u0438\u0435. \u0418 \u0422\u043e\u0440\u0443 \u0432\u0441\u044f\u0447\u0435\u0441\u043a\u0438 \u0436\u0435\u043b\u0430\u0435\u0442 \u0432\u0435\u0440\u043d\u0443\u0442\u044c \u0435\u0433\u043e \u0440\u0430\u0437\u043b\u0438\u0447\u043d\u044b\u043c\u0438 \u0441\u043f\u043e\u0441\u043e\u0431\u0430\u043c\u0438 \u043a\u0430\u0436\u0434\u044b\u0439 \u0434\u0435\u043d\u044c. \u041c\u0438\u043b\u0430\u044f \u0438 \u043f\u043e\u0432\u0441\u0435\u0434\u043d\u0435\u0432\u043d\u0430\u044f \u043a\u043e\u043c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u044f. \u0422\u043e\u043b\u044c\u043a\u043e \u0435\u0441\u0442\u044c \u043e\u0434\u043d\u0430 \u043d\u0435\u043e\u0431\u044b\u0447\u043d\u0430\u044f \u0434\u0435\u0442\u0430\u043b\u044c: \u0422\u043e\u0440\u0443 \u2013 \u0432\u043b\u044e\u0431\u043b\u0435\u043d\u043d\u0430\u044f \u0434\u0440\u0430\u043a\u043e\u043d\u0435\u0441\u0441\u0430.","es-la":"Kobayashi vive en un apartamento cuando un dia un dragon llamado Tooru toca a su puerta. Tooru piensa que los humanos son humildes y tontos pero ella tiene una deuda con Kobayashi que la salvo en el pasado. Por eso todos los dias Tooru trata de usar sus poderes para ayudar a Kobayashi en varias cosas. Una comedia de una se\u00f1ora de oficina y una linda chica maid dragon viviendo juntas el d\u00eda a d\u00eda","pt-br":"Kobayashi vive sozinha em um apartamento, at\u00e9 que um dia, Tooru, a garota drag\u00e3o, apareceu e elas acabaram morando juntas. Tooru v\u00ea os humanos como seres inferiores e tolos. Mas tendo sido salva por Kobayashi-san, ela faz tudo que pode para pagar a d\u00edvida e ajud\u00e1-la com v\u00e1rias coisas, embora nem tudo corre conforme o planejado. Uma com\u00e9dia do cotidiano m\u00edtico sobre uma mulher do escrit\u00f3rio trabalhando duro para viver com uma garota drag\u00e3o."}

name: Strike the Blood
description:
{"en":"The fourth primogenitor - is the strongest vampire who exists only in the world of legends; yet when this masters the 12 kenju, the spread of the catastrophe of the vampires will appear in Japan.  
  
 In order to spy on and erase this, "fourth primogenitor," the government owned Lion organization have decided to send an attacking magician, "sword shaman" to complete the task. Yet unknowingly, the one who was selected to spy was actually a trainee "sword shaman" girl - Himeragi Yukina.  
  
The following links are to AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime:
