name: Hellsing
description:
{"cs":"Hellsing je temnou a krvavou výpravou do světa, kde je hranice mezi lidskostí a monstrozitou velmi tenká. V centru dění stojí agentura Hellsing, tajná společnost, zasvěcená ochraně Britského impéria před nadpřirozenými hrozbami. Ředitelkou této agenturu je mladá a odhodlaná lady Integral Fairbrook Wingates van Hellsing, která vládne nejen pomocí své železné vůle, ale také pomocí svých věrných spojenců – Alukard, upír s temnou minulostí a znepokojivě ničivou silou. Viktorie Serasová, mladá naivní policistka, která se upírem stala teprve nedávno a Walter C. Dornez, starý anglický komorník, jehož síla a moudrost nemusí být na první pohled zcela patrná.
 
Příběh sleduje střet mezi Hellsingem a jeho nepřáteli, ať už jde o šílené upíry, fanatické náboženské organizace či dlouho zapomenuté síly, jenž se vymykají běžnému lidskému chápání. Temná atmosféra, výstřední postavy, akce a břitký humor dodávají příběhu jedinečný rytmus, kde krveprolití, vtip a hlubší podtóny jdou ruku v ruce.","en":"Vampires exist. It is the duty of Hellsing, an organization sponsored by the British government, to hide that frightening fact and protect the blissfully unaware populace. Along with its own personal army, Hellsing also has a few secret weapons. Alucard, an incredibly powerful vampire, has been controlled by Hellsing for years. Although he dislikes being a servant to the Hellsing family, he certainly enjoys his job as Hellsing's vampire exterminator. Seras is a fledgling vampire and a former police woman. Although reluctant to embrace her new self, she is still a valuable member of the organisation. Integra Hellsing, the current leader, is usually fully capable of fulfilling her duty, but lately, vampire activity has been on the rise. Unfortunately, the cause is more alarming than anything she could have imagined. A group long thought dead has been plotting in secret since their apparent destruction over 50 years ago. Plotting to plunge England, and perhaps the entire world, into war.  


---","es":"La familia Van Helsing ha sido la némesis del conde Drácula y de toda la raza de vampiros.Ahora se ha convertido en toda una organización cuyo mejor cazador,un vampiro,usará el humor y la violencia para cumplir su destino...y ha dado origen a una exitosa serie de animación.","fr":"En Angleterre, l'organisation secrète Hellsing agit pour protéger le pays des forces du mal, dont les vampires. Force de frappe de l'Église protestante, ce groupe dispose d'une arme secrète des plus inattendues: Alucard, vampire surpuissant et apparemment invulnérable. Mais leur mission se corsera quand ils devront faire face au Vatican et aux brigades anti-monstres de l'État le plus petit du monde...","hu":"A Hellsing Királyi Protestáns Lovagrend az Angol Korona évszázados szervezete – egy család, amelynek a feladata a birodalom védelme a természetfeletti és istentelen veszedelmektől. A lovagrend lelke Sir Integra Wingates Hellsing, legfőbb fegyvere pedig Alucard, a szervezet szolgálatában álló titokzatos ősvámpír, valamint – újabban – Seras Victoria, egy balul elsült bevetésen született vámpírlány.","it":"Londra, un'antica casata nobiliare combatte contro i vampiri da generazioni; si tratta dell'agenzia segreta HELLSING, comandata da Lady Integra Farbuke Wingates Hellsing.Integra, succeduta alla morte del padre, stipula un patto di sangue con il on il vampiro Alucard e lo induce a battersi contro le tremende forze occulte che minacciano il pianeta, dando vita a una delle saghe horror più famose nel panorama dei manga.","ja":"幽霊船デメテル号に乗ってアーカードが遂に来た！かくして役者は全員演壇へと登り、暁の惨劇は幕を上げる・・・・・・","lt":"Kažkur Anglijoje gyvuoja slapta organizacija, sukurta tam, kad apgintų karalienę ir šalį nuo įvairiausio plauko pabaisų. Sveiki atvykę į paslaptingąjį Hellsing – organizaciją, kuri žino, kaip spręsti problemas, kai iš tamsos išnyra vampyrai, gūlai ir kitokios šlykštynės. Be to, organizacijos nariai gali pasigirti puikiu ginklu.

Klausiate, kokiu? Ogi kitu vampyru, kuris šimtmečius tobulino savąjį kovos meną ir todėl yra bemaž neįveikiamas. Apsiginklavęs milžinišku pistoletu, užtaisytu ypatingomis sidabrinėmis kulkomis, Alukardas kelia siaubą ne tik nemirėliams. Tačiau ne tai svarbiausia. Skaitytoją visų pirma priblokš kandus šių istorijų sąmojis, neįtikėtinos iliustracijos ir beprotiškai kruvinas veiksmas. Nenuostabu, jog ši manga užkariavo visą pasaulį.","pt":"Para resolver o caso de um estranho pastor de hábitos macabros, é chamada a Organização Hellsing, responsável por livrar a Inglaterra dos males que espreitam na noite. Alucard é a principal arma da Hellsing contra estes seres, e sua história se cruza com a da novata Seras Victoria e a da chefe da organização, Integra Wingates Hellsing.","ru":"Вампир Алукард - древний и могущественный, вампир "в самом расцвете сил". Все что его интересует - это поиски по-настоящему сильного противника. Убивать и умирать - какие еще могут быть развлечения в бессмертной жизни? И организация "Хеллсинг", члены которой посвятили себя борьбе с порождениями тьмы вроде него. Что может их связывать кроме желания уничтожить друг друга? Но, как ни странно, Алукард и Хеллсинг прекрасно работают вместе… и будут работать ровно до тех пор, пока древний вампир не найдет для себя действительно могущественного и интересного врага.","tr":"Hortlaklar, vampirler, canavarlar... Kraliyet Protestan Şövalyeler Kardeşliği, yani Hellsing, onlarla kadim zamanlardan beri mücadele ediyor. Nasıl mı? Tabii ki yüksek teknoloji ürünü silahlar ve ekipmanla... Üstelik bunları kullanan kişi tam bir vampir uzmanı. Hellsing sizi aksiyon ve kan yüklü bir dünyaya davet ediyor.

Bu sayıda Hellsing Organizasyonu'nun avlarıyla ve düşmanlarıyla tanışıyoruz. Hiç beklenmeyen bazı gelişmeler, Integra Hellsing'in tüm planlarını bozuyor. Üstelik, kurumun yakın geçmişinde yaşanan güç oyunları ve entrikalar da karşımıza çıkıyor. Bakalım Hellsing bütün bu olanlarla başa çıkabildi mi ve olacaklarla başa çıkabilecek mi?","es-la":"Llega uno de los mayores éxitos de los últimos años! Hellsing, una organización auspiciada por el gobierno británico, controlada por la implacable Integra, busca exterminar a los despiadados vampiros, cuya actividad va en aumento y causa pánico en la población. Su principal arma es Alucard, un sádico vampiro liberado por Integra después de años de reclusión. Junto a él, Victoria Seras, una chica policía ahora mitad vampiro. El peligro? Una posible guerra mundial. Mucho más explícito, violento, humorístico y adulto que la serie de TV."}

name: Hell’s Paradise: Jigokuraku
description:
{"en":"Gabimaru the Empty, a former ninja assassin feared as a heartless husk of a man, spends his days on death row wondering when an executioner skilled enough to so much as harm him will arrive, as he thinks nothing of seeing an end to his meaningless existence… Or so he thought. 
Then the lady executioner, Asaemon the Beheader, rekindles his hope with an astounding proposition. 
If he ever wishes to see his beloved wife again, he must embark under the auspices of the shogunate on a perilous voyage to the mysterious mystic island said to house the elixir of immortality. 
Should he be the one among many rival death-row fiends and scoundrels to find the elixir, he'll earn a full exoneration, and, more importantly, a chance at an ordinary married life with the light of his life: the woman who made the world seem not so ugly. 
What awaits them is a journey like no other!","ru":"Это случилось во времена правления одиннадцатого сёгуна из династии Токугава… Габимару, некогда сильнейший синоби, собиравшийся покинуть свою деревню, захвачен в плен. Но Ямада Асаэмон, девушка-палач, предложила ему прощение и свободу с одним условием… Он должен заполучить в райских землях эликсир бессмертия!.. Романтические приключения и искусство ниндзюцу от Каку Юдзи.","pt-br":"Gabimaru, o Vazio, é um dos ninjas assassinos mais cruéis que já saiu da vila de Iwagakure. Ele é implacavelmente eficiente, mas uma traição resulta em uma sentença de morte. Só há uma esperança para ter sua liberdade: viajar para uma ilha escondida e conseguir um elixir, que tornará o shogun imortal. O fracasso não é uma opção, nesta ilha, o Céu e o Inferno estão a um metro de distância."}

name: Engage Kiss
description:
{"en":"Veyron City—a mega-floating metropolis created from the discovery of new energy sources.

Shuu, a young man who owns and operates a small business in the area, leads a meager life due to his reckless spending. Kisara, a girl who visits Shuu's office and home because she is constantly concerned about him. She works while attending high school in Veyron City, doing everything from clerical work to housework. Ayano, Shuu's ex-girlfriend and a senior colleague at the corporation he had previously worked for, is also worried about him.

Thus begins the slapstick romantic comedy of three people in a slightly unusual relationship that takes place on an artificial island in the Pacific Ocean.","ja":"「悪魔」が引き起こす特殊な事件「Ｄ災害」が多発しているメガフロート都市…ベイロンシティ。
この場所で、悪魔退治の仕事をする青年・緒方シュウは、日頃の金遣いの荒さからひもじい生活を送っていた。
そんな彼を心配し、世話を焼くのは美少女高校生・キサラ。
しかし、彼女の正体は、じつはキスを代償として彼と契約した「悪魔」で…!?
シュウの元カノと、二人の危うい絆が織りなす予測不能のラブコメディー！"}

name: The God of High School
description: {"en":"While an island half-disappearing from the face of the earth, a mysterious organization is sending out invitations for a tournament to every skilled fighter in the world. If you win you can have ANYTHING you want.  \r\nThey're recruiting only the best to fight the best and claim the title of The God of High School!","hi":"\u2022 [Naver Webtoon Fan Translation (Hindi)]("}

name: Sono Monban, Saikyou Nitsuki ~Tsuihou Sareta Bougyo Ryoku 9999 no Senshi, Outo no Monban Toshite Musou Suru~
description: {"en":"Sieg is an adventurer with an incredible defensive power, and he always uses himself to attract the monsters' attention to assist his teammates. However, the party leader just focused on offense without realizing Sieg's intention, so he kicked him out. After Sieg left, the team repeatedly failed multiple quests \u2026 At the same time, Sieg took the position of gatekeeper at the Royal Capital. Thanks to his defensive power, he was quickly promoted to division captain. His subordinates included a carefree big-breasted Swordswoman, a perverse freakish girl, and an Archer with an erratic temperament. He and the girls started slowly gaining the trust of people around them!","ja":"\u30ba\u30d0\u629c\u3051\u305f\u9632\u5fa1\u529b\u3067\u30d1\u30fc\u30c6\u30a3\u30fc\u3092\u5f71\u304b\u3089\u652f\u3048\u3066\u3044\u305f\u30b8\u30fc\u30af\u3060\u3063\u305f\u304c\u3001\u653b\u6483\u91cd\u8996\u306e\u30ea\u30fc\u30c0\u30fc\u304b\u3089\u8ffd\u653e\u3092\u8a00\u3044\u6e21\u3055\u308c\u3066\u3057\u307e\u3046\u3002\u5fc3\u6a5f\u4e00\u8ee2\u3092\u56f3\u308b\u3079\u304f\u30b8\u30fc\u30af\u306f\u738b\u90fd\u306e\u9580\u756a\u306b\u5c31\u8077\u3002\u30c1\u30fc\u30c8\u7d1a\u306e\u9632\u5fa1\u529b\u3067\u3059\u3050\u306b\u5206\u968a\u9577\u306b\u6607\u683c\u3057\u3001\u90e8\u4e0b\u306b\u3064\u3044\u305f\u7121\u9632\u5099\u306a\u5de8\u4e73\u5263\u58eb\u3001\u30bb\u30af\u30cf\u30e9\u597d\u304d\u306e\u602a\u529b\u5973\u3001\u30e4\u30f3\u30c7\u30ec\u6c17\u8cea\u306e\u5f13\u4f7f\u3044\u3068\u3068\u3082\u306b\u9632\u5fa1\u7121\u53cc\u3059\u308b\uff01","es-la":"Sieg es un aventurero con un poder defensivo incre\u00edble, y siempre se usa a s\u00ed mismo para atraer la atenci\u00f3n de los monstruos para ayudar a sus compa\u00f1eros de grupo. Sin embargo, el l\u00edder del grupo se centr\u00f3 en la ofensiva sin darse cuenta de la intenci\u00f3n de Sieg, por lo que lo ech\u00f3. Despu\u00e9s de que Sieg se fue, el grupo fall\u00f3 repetidamente en m\u00faltiples misiones... Al mismo tiempo, Sieg tom\u00f3 el puesto de guardi\u00e1n en la Capital Real. Gracias a su poder defensivo, r\u00e1pidamente fue ascendido a capit\u00e1n de divisi\u00f3n. Sus subordinados inclu\u00edan una espadachina despreocupada de grandes pechos, una chica monstruosa y perversa y una arquera con un temperamento err\u00e1tico. \u00a1\u00c9l y las chicas comenzaron a ganarse lentamente la confianza de las personas que los rodeaban!"}

name: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou
description:
{"en":"Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!
___
**Storyboarder:** [Oomine](
**Character Designer:** [Nabeshima Tetsuhiro](

**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](","ja":"自宅でのんびりすることが、最強への近道だった――。強力な魔力スポットの上に建つ一軒家に住んでいた普通の青年ダイチ。 ある日、それを狙うやつらに家ごと異世界に召喚されてしまう!!　だが、長年魔力スポットに住み続け、魔力が貯めこまれたダイチは敵を一蹴！　さらにかわいい我が家の精霊サクラも現れて至れり尽くせり！　最強の魔力を持ったダイチが望むものはただ一つ――それは自宅で平穏に暮らすこと！","ru":"Жить беззаботно в своём доме — это, несомненно, великолепно. Но мой дом — самое большое в мире место волшебной силы. Каким-то образом вышло так, что меня с моим домом перенесло в другой мир. Выяснилось, что меня призвали какие-то парни, которые хотели присвоить магию моего дома себе. Тем не менее, я живу в этом месте в течение многих лет, и мое тело, по-видимому, аномально переполнено магией. Из-за каких-то непредвиденных обстоятельств те ребята, которые меня вызвали, быстро убежали. Как бы то ни было, все ещё есть невоспитанные люди, которые жаждут магии, просачивающейся из моего дома. Я не отдам свой дом никому! Я буду использовать свою силу, как захочу!   

- [Original Web Novel]( (Raw)","es-la":"Vivir sin preocupaciones en casa es el mejor atajo: mi casa es el mayor punto de poder mágico del mundo. Siendo ese el caso, tanto mi casa como yo fuimos invocados a otro mundo. Sin embargo, he estado viviendo en este lugar durante muchos años y aparentemente mi cuerpo está desbordado magia. Debido a circunstancias imprevistas por parte de los tipos que me invocaron, huyeron rápidamente. Como sea, todavía hay algunas personas mal educadas que codician la magia que escapa de mi casa. ¡No voy a ceder mi casa a esas personas! ¡Voy a ejercer mi poder como me plazca!","pt-br":"Viver despreocupado em casa é a melhor coisa... minha casa é o maior ponto de força mágica do mundo. Sendo esse o caso, tanto minha casa quanto eu fomos convocados para outro mundo por algumas pessoas que estavam visado isso. No entanto, eu moro neste lugar há muitos anos e meu corpo está, aparentemente, transbordando de forma anormal com a magia. Devido a algumas circunstâncias imprevistas por aquelas pessoas que me chamaram, elas rapidamente fugiram. Seja como for, ainda há algumas pessoas mal-educadas que cobiçam a magia que vaza da minha casa. Eu não vou desistir da minha casa para essas pessoas! Vou usar meu poder como quiser!"}

name: Fuun Kara no Saikyou Otoko
description:
{"en":"After having lived a life full of misfortune, Siegbert has been reincarnated as a result of an accident. His new family is so warm. He can't believe he was unlucky in his previous life.  

He thought he would live a peaceful life this time, but unfortunately, his luck level is abnormally high and his luckiness attracts "chance" and can make whatever his wish come true if he can tackle these "chances". However, these "chances" comes with a price, Siegbert and those around him has to face formidable enemies and a life-or-death situation.  

Siegbert is determined to beat all of the odds with his abnormally high magic power and appraisal eye that he got after reincarnating to protect those around him.","id":"Siegbert yang selalu tertimpa kemalangan di kehidupan sebelumnya, sekarang ia tereinkarnasi ke dunia lain.
Ia tidak mengira keluarga barunya merupakan keluarga yang hangat karena kemalangan yang ia hadapi di kehidupan sebelumnya.
Akan tetapi, apakah ia akan tetap dihujani oleh kemalangan bahkan setelah tereinkarnasi?"}

name: Chouten Hoshokusha ~Chikyuu Saijaku no Ore ga Uchuu Saikyou~
description: {"en":"Earth's weakest becomes the universe's strongest with cheat abilities\u2013!? While all of humanity awakens to their powers due to the invasion of extraterrestrial life forms (EVA), the protagonist Vi is the only one without abilities. Just as he's about to die, devoured by an EVA, a cheat-level ability activates\u2026 A highly anticipated modern battle fantasy!"}

name: Okinawa de Suki ni Natta Ko ga Hougen Sugite Tsura Sugiru
Daily Life of Sa-chan, a Drugstore Clerk
description: {"en":"A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.","fr":"> Une s\u00e9rie r\u00e9unissant une employ\u00e9e de pharmacie sans expression, Sa-chan, et son ami d'enfance turbulent qui est fou amoureux d'elle mais qui h\u00e9site \u00e0 lui avouer son amour. Accompagnez-les dans leur quotidien plein de com\u00e9die amoureuse en travaillant dans une pharmacie.","id":"Seri antara petugas toko obat tanpa ekspresi, Sa-chan, dan teman masa kecilnya yang riuh yang jungkir balik terhadap Sa-chan tetapi ragu-ragu dalam mengakui cintanya padanya. Bergabunglah dengan mereka dalam kehidupan sehari-hari mereka yang penuh romansa bekerja di toko obat.","ja":"\u30c9\u30e9\u30c3\u30b0\u30b9\u30c8\u30a2\u3067\u50cd\u304f\u3055\u3063\u3061\u3083\u3093\u3068\u305d\u306e\u5e7c\u306a\u3058\u307f\u304c\u4e21\u601d\u3044\u306a\u3093\u3060\u3051\u3069\u3001\u304a\u4e92\u3044\u6c17\u3065\u304b\u306a\u304f\u3066\u6bce\u65e5\u3084\u304d\u3082\u304d\u3059\u308b\u8a71\u3067\u3059\u3002","pt-br":"Uma s\u00e9rie entre a inexpressiva balconista da drogaria, Sa-chan, e seu turbulento amigo de inf\u00e2ncia que est\u00e1 de ponta-cabe\u00e7a por Sa-chan, mas hesita em confessar seu amor por ela. Junte-se a eles em sua vida cotidiana repleta de com\u00e9dia rom\u00e2ntica trabalhando em uma farm\u00e1cia."}

name: Osananajimi no S-kyuu Party kara Tsuihou sareta Seijuutsukai.: Bannou Shien Mahou to Nakama wo Fuyashite Saikyou e!
description: {"en":"A beast tamer without a familiar, Lock had been supporting his friends in an S Rank party until they finally decided to use him as a decoy and abandoned him. After a conversation with the Fenrir his party was attacking, it chose to serve him as his familiar. By using and expanding the [Mini Monster Garden], Lock gathers more and more familiars to form the strongest- and cutest- party ever.","ja":"\u8056\u7363\u4f7f\u3044\u306a\u306e\u306b\u8056\u7363\u304c\u4f7f\u5f79\u3067\u304d\u305a\u3001\u5e7c\u99b4\u67d3\u30d1\u30fc\u30c6\u30a3\u306b\u6368\u3066\u3089\u308c\u305f\u60b2\u904b\u306e\u7537\u30fb\u30ed\u30c3\u30af\u3002\u3057\u304b\u3057\u3001\u3068\u3042\u308b\u3053\u3068\u304b\u3089\u30d5\u30a7\u30f3\u30ea\u30eb\u306e\u4f7f\u5f79\u306b\u6210\u529f\u3057\u3066\u30fc\u30fc\uff01\uff1f"}

name: The Beast Tamer
description: {"en":"A killer transmigrates into a loser in ancient times, and unexpectedly obtains a beast taming golden finger. The female lead begins fighting in the martial arts world. tearing up scumbags and beating up the vermin of society. While doing that, she falls in love and collects wild beasts as pets. With the goal of becoming stronger, she is bound to be at the peak of Yunmeng Ze!"}

name: Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou Zero
Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
description:
{"en":"Among the class transported to another world, Nagumo Hajime is an ordinary male student who didn't have ambition nor aspiration in life, and thus called "Incompetent" by his classmates.

The class was summoned to become heroes and save a country from destruction. Students of the class were blessed with cheat specifications and cool job class, however, it was not the case with Hajime, with his profession as a "Synergist", and his very mediocre stats. "Synergist", to put it in another word, was just artisan class. Being the weakest, he then falls to the depth of the abyss when he and his classmates were exploring a dungeon. What did he find in the depth of the abyss, and can he survive?
___
**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](","fr":"Le quotidien de l’étudiant ordinaire qu’est Hajime Nagumo, dont la vie ne se comporte que de nuits blanches et siestes en cours, se retrouve bouleversé lorsque sa classe et lui se retrouvent transportés en tant qu’héros dans un autre monde afin de le sauver… Alors que tout le monde obtient des jobs assez puissants, notre héros se retrouve avec le job « Synergiste », assez inutile en l’état des choses, humilié et jeté seul dans les tréfonds d’un donjon, arrivera-t-il à survivre ?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](","it":"Tra gli studenti trasportati in un altro mondo, Nagumo Hajime è uno studente senza ambizioni ed aspirazioni nella vita, è infatti soprannominato l’Incapace dai suoi compagni.
Gli studenti sono stati evocati per ergersi ad eroi e salvare il paese dalla distruzione. A loro sono stati donati poteri e classi di livello, a tutti tranne che a Nagumo Hajime, che inizia da Sinergista con statistiche mediocri.
Il Sinergista, è in altre parole un “crafter”. Essendo il più debole, finisce per cadere nelle profondità di un abisso durante l'esplorazione di un sotterraneo. 
Cosa troverà nelle profondità dell’abisso... e riuscirà a sopravvivere?","ja":"『趣味の合間に人生』を座右の銘としている南雲ハジメは、突然クラスメイトと共に異世界に召喚されてしまう。現地人とは比べ物にならない能力を皆が発現させる中、ハジメが発現させたのは、ごくありふれた能力である"錬成師"だった……。","pl":"Wśród uczniów klasy przeniesionej do innego świata, Hajime Nagumo niczym się nie wyróżnia; ot najzwyklejszy w świecie uczeń niemający ambicji czy życiowego celu, dlatego też nazywany w klasie "Nieudacznikiem".
Gdy cała klasa trafiła do innego świata, by zostać bohaterami i ocalić cały kraj przed zniszczeniem, wszyscy zostali pobłogosławieni oszukańczymi statystykami i świetnymi profesjami… za wyjątkiem Hajime, który skończył z profesją "Synergetyka" i przeciętnymi statystykami. "Synergetyk", ujmując to inaczej, jest zwyczajną klasą rzemieślniczą. Będąc najsłabszym w klasie, spada w głąb otchłani podczas wspólnego eksplorowania lochu. Czego dowiedział się w jej czeluściach i czy uda mu się przetrwać?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](","ru":"Хадзимэ Нагумо, живущий по принципу «Первым делом - хобби», и весь его класс вдруг призывают в другой мир. Одноклассники один за другим открывают невероятные по меркам этого мира способности, ну а Хадзимэ достается бесполезный ремесленный класс «Синергист». Оказавшись в самых глубинах преисподней, он находит применения своему заурядному таланту и стремится найти выход из лабиринта…  


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](","es-la":"Entre la clase transportada a otro mundo, Nagumo Hajime es un estudiante normal y corriente que no tiene ambiciones ni aspiraciones en la vida, por lo que sus compañeros le llaman "Incompetente".
La clase fue convocada para convertirse en héroes y salvar a un país de la destrucción. Los estudiantes de la clase fueron bendecidos con habilidades tramposas y una categoría de trabajo genial, sin embargo, no fue el caso de Hajime, con su profesión de "Sinergista", y sus estadísticas muy mediocres. "Sinergista", para decirlo en otra palabra era simplemente la clase artesanal. Siendo el más débil, entonces cae a la profundidad del abismo cuando él y sus compañeros estaban explorando una mazmorra. ¿Qué encontró en la profundidad del abismo, y podrá sobrevivir?","pt-br":"Entre a turma transportada para outro mundo, Nagumo Hajime é um estudante do sexo masculino comum que não tem ambição nem aspiração na vida, e, portanto, chamado de " incompetente" por seus colegas. A classe foi convocada para se tornar heróis e salvar um país da destruição. Os alunos da classe foram abençoados com as especificações de trapaça e classes legais, no entanto, não foi o caso com Hajime , com a sua profissão como um " Synergist " , e suas estatísticas muito medíocres. "Synergist", para colocá-lo em outras palavrsa era apenas a classe dos artesãos. Sendo o mais fraco , então ele cai para a profundidade do abismo , quando ele e seus colegas estavam explorando uma dungeon. O que ele encontra na profundidade do abismo, e ele pode sobreviver?"}

name: Eroge Tensei: Unmei ni Aragau Kane Buta Kizoku no Funtouki
description:
{"en":"I went to bed after completing the blockbuster eroge game that had become a trending topic in the past few days. When I woke up, I noticed something was different. Somehow, and for some reason, I got reincarnated in the initial stage of the same game that I was playing before.

The most concerning part was my character. I was playing the role of a character who challenges the hero and gets defeated. In addition, all the routes of this particular character have been confirmed death.

I got reincarnated as an underdog, and the situation is even worse, because someone has already defeated me in a duel. I can’t escape death anymore. But I won’t give up. I have the knowledge of the eroge game that I had cleared in my previous life. I will make full use of it and try to survive.

This is a story about our hero who got reincarnated as an eroge underdog character, and is trying his hardest to survive."}

name: Zatsuyo Gakari Ken Shien Jutsu Shi Ha Party Tsuiho Ni Akogareru ~Seken Ha Tsuiho Boomnanoni, Ore Wo Kadai Hyoka Suru Party Member Tachi Ga Kesshite Tebanaso to Shitekurenai~
description: {"en":"\"Stormbreaker,\" an up-and-coming party of young adventurers, is making waves in the dungeon conquest world with its record-breaking speed. Amidst this, Monog, who works as a handyman and a support mage, begins to doubt whether he will be expelled from \"Stormbreaker\" due to the recent \"Attacker Supremacy\" trend. However, the other members have no intention of kicking him out. In fact, they are the complete opposite...? Is the negative handyman actually a genius(?) support mage?","es":"El grupo de aventureros j\u00f3venes y prometedores 'Stormbreaker' est\u00e1 causando sensaci\u00f3n al progresar en la conquista del calabozo a una velocidad r\u00e9cord. En medio de esto, Monogu, quien trabaja en tareas generales y tambi\u00e9n es un mago de apoyo, se siente cada vez m\u00e1s paranoico debido al actual 'atacante supremacista' que prevalece, temiendo ser expulsado de 'Stormbreaker'. Sin embargo, los miembros no tienen intenciones de expulsarlo, \u00a1y de hecho, algo totalmente opuesto...? \u00a1El despectivo asistente resulta ser un genio mago de apoyo! Junto a los miembros con personalidades \u00fanicas y adorables, \u00a1apuntemos a convertirnos en el grupo m\u00e1s fuerte! \u00a1Desde 'Novela Web', una historia de aventuras juveniles y harem!","ja":"\u65b0\u9032\u6c17\u92ed\u306e\u82e5\u624b\u30d1\u30fc\u30c6\u30a3\u30fc\u300c\u30b9\u30c8\u30fc\u30e0\u30d6\u30ec\u30a4\u30ab\u30fc\u300d\u306f\u3001\u6700\u901f\u8a18\u9332\u3067\u30c0\u30f3\u30b8\u30e7\u30f3\u653b\u7565\u3092\u9032\u3081\u308b\u4eca\u8a71\u984c\u306e\u5192\u967a\u8005\u96c6\u56e3\u3060\u3002\u305d\u3093\u306a\u4e2d\u3001\u96d1\u7528\u4fc2\u517c\u652f\u63f4\u8853\u5e2b\u306e\u30e2\u30ce\u30b0\u306f\u6628\u4eca\u306e\u300c\u30a2\u30bf\u30c3\u30ab\u30fc\u81f3\u4e0a\u4e3b\u7fa9\u300d\u306b\u3088\u308a\u3001\u81ea\u8eab\u304c\u300c\u30b9\u30c8\u30fc\u30e0\u30d6\u30ec\u30a4\u30ab\u30fc\u300d\u304b\u3089\u8ffd\u653e\u3055\u308c\u308b\u306e\u3067\u306f\uff1f\u3068\u7591\u5fc3\u6697\u9b3c\u306b\u9665\u3063\u3066\u3044\u305f\u3002\u3057\u304b\u3057\u3001\u30e1\u30f3\u30d0\u30fc\u305f\u3061\u306f\u8ffd\u653e\u3057\u3088\u3046\u3068\u306f\u601d\u3063\u3066\u304a\u3089\u305a\u3001\u305d\u308c\u3069\u3053\u308d\u304b\u307e\u3063\u305f\u304f\u306e\u771f\u9006\u3067\u2026\uff1f\u30cd\u30ac\u30c6\u30a3\u30d6\u96d1\u7528\u4fc2\u306f\u5929\u624d\uff08\uff1f\uff09\u652f\u63f4\u8853\u5e2b\u3060\u3063\u305f\uff01\uff1f"}

name: D-kyuu Boukensha no Ore, Naze ka Yuusha Party ni Kanyuu Sareta Ageku, Oujo ni Tsukimatowareteru
Let this Grieving Soul Retire: Woe is the Weakling Who Leads the Strongest Party
description:
{"en":"The golden age of treasure hunters who seek wealth, honor, power and glory, and explore dungeons around the world without regard to the danger.  
  
"Lets be treasure hunters," said Cry Andolihy, who swore an oath with his childhood friends to become the strongest … but he discovered during his first quest that he has no talent.  
  
But that was only the beginning of his adventure.  
  
"I can't do this anymore. I want to quit."  
  
"Oh, I see. In other words, we should fight harder and cover for you, that's a good handicap."  
"Rest assured, Cry. We'll protect you!"  
"Oh, wait. If you step on that, the trap will destroy you without leaving a speck of dust behind. Be careful, Leader!"  
  
Protected by his overpowered childhood friends, sought out by newbies and nobles, they aim to be heroes and find powerful treasures.  
  
Will Cry really be able to retire safely from being a Treasure Hunter?

[Alt Official English](","ja":"「目指すはただひとつ　世界最強の英雄だ」

幼馴染みたちと共に最強の英雄になる誓いを立てたクライだったが、早々に才能がないことに気づく。――にもかかわらず、なぜか周りからの期待だけが跳ね上がっていく日々…。そしてクライの発言によって物事はいつもトンデモない方向へ――!?","pt":"A idade de ouro dos caçadores de tesouros que buscam riqueza, honra, poder e glória, e exploram tesouros ao redor do mundo sem levar em conta o perigo.   
"Vamos nos tornar um caçadores de tesouros", disse Cri Andrich, que fez um juramentocom seu um amigo de infância que iria se tornar o herói mais forte, mas não tinha talento.   
No entanto, a avaliação do entorno é de alguma forma alta por algum motivo, e apenas as expectativas estão saltando todos os dias.   
Toda vez que um amigo distante da raça humana entra em fúria, subir é uma habilidade de se sentar à terra! ”Uma   
fantasia cômica popular equivocada finalmente se torna realidade  
  
  
**Link :**  
- [WN Raw](","vi":"Cùng làm thợ săn kho báu nào! Mục tiêu chỉ có một: Trở thành anh hùng mạnh nhất thế giới! Xưa kia, có 6 người đã thề hứa như vậy với nhau. Duy chỉ có một chàng trai trong số đó cực kì thiếu tài năng. Một ngày nọ, sau khi giãi bày những phiền muộn của mình với người bạn thuở nhỏ, cậu nhận được lời khuyên: "Krai này, không có vai gì hợp thì cậu làm leader đi". Tổ đội Strange Grief do những kẻ quái vật siêu tài năng (bạn thuở nhỏ) thành lập đã vang danh khắp đế quốc suốt vài năm nay. Và trước khi kịp hiểu được chuyện gì đang xảy ra, Krai đã được cất nhắc lên vị trí cao nhất, leader của tổ đội mạnh nhất. Bởi kì vọng tăng vọt của những người xung quanh, lời nói và hành động của cậu ta luôn bị hiểu nhầm, khiến cho tình hình chuyển biến theo hướng không ai ngờ tới... Đây là sử thi anh hùng đầy vinh quang và đau khổ của Krai Andrey trứ danh, clan master mạnh nhất của tổ đội mạnh nhất!"}

name: Saikin Haitta Shiro Madoushi ga Party Crusher de, Ore no Isekai Boukensha Seikatsu ga Houkai ni Kiki na Ken ni Tsuite
description: {"en":"Toma was transported to another world due to an accident caused by a female circle crusher. So, he made friends in the new world and rebuilt his life as an adventurer. However, then, another girl joined his party... Will his life collapse once again because of another circle crusher who also exists in this new world!?","id":"Toma tertransmigrasi ke dunia lain akibat kecelakaan yang disebabkan oleh seorang perempuan perusak sirkel. Maka, ia membuat teman-teman di dunia baru tersebut dan membangun kembali hidupnya sebagai seorang petualang. Namun, kemudian, seorang gadis lain bergabung dalam timnya... Akankah hidupnya runtuh sekali lagi karena perusak sirkel lain yang juga ada di dunia baru ini!?","ja":"\u30b5\u30fc\u30af\u30eb\u30af\u30e9\u30c3\u30b7\u30e3\u30fc\u5973\u5b50\u306e\u9a12\u52d5\u306b\u5dfb\u304d\u8fbc\u307e\u308c\u3066\u6b7b\u306b\u306a\u305c\u304b\u7570\u4e16\u754c\u306b\u8ee2\u79fb\u3057\u305f\u30bd\u30fc\u30de\u306f\u5192\u967a\u8005\u3068\u3057\u3066\u7b2c\u4e8c\u306e\u4eba\u751f\u3092\u6b69\u3093\u3067\u3044\u305f\u3002\u305d\u3093\u306a\u5f7c\u306e\u524d\u306b\u30b5\u30fc\u30af\u30eb\u30af\u30e9\u30c3\u30b7\u30e3\u30fc\u306a\u3089\u306c\u30d1\u30fc\u30c6\u30a3\u30af\u30e9\u30c3\u30b7\u30e3\u30fc\u304c\u73fe\u308c\u305f\u2015\u2015!!"}

name: Sabikui Bisco
description:
{"en":"The story is set in a Japan that is ravaged by plague-like rust, and details the journey of the strongest mushroom hunter Bisco Akaboshi and young doctor Milo Nekoyanagi and their search for the legendary medicinal mushroom “Sabikui”, believed to be the cure for the rust.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Comikey]("}

name: Sabikui Bisco 2
description: {"en":"A plague-like wind blows across the arid, sandy expanse of a post-apocalyptic Japan. As it sweeps over the living and nonliving alike, rust is all that remains in its wake. The cause of the catastrophic state of the world is believed to be mushroom spores. Bisco Akaboshi, known as the \"Man- Eating Mushroom,\" is a wanted criminal archer whose arrows instantly grow mushrooms wherever they land. However, he is in reality a \"Mushroom Protector,\" a person who spreads fungi in order to enrich the land and return it to its previous state.\n\nNatsuki announced that they would be the new artist of the manga adaptation starting with the manga's second part."}

name: Love After World Domination
Soredemo, Yasashii Koi o Suru
description: {"en":"Onoda and Deguchi have been friends for three years. Since then, Deguchi has loved Onoda \u2013 but for fear of being rejected, he had not said anything until Onoda confessed feeling attracted to Shima. If Onoda can love Shima, he can love him too, right?","fr":"Avec le temps, Onoda est tomb\u00e9 amoureux de son coll\u00e8gue Shima. Mais r\u00e9cemment il s'est rendu compte qu''il aimait simplement le Shima amoureux de Togawa.\n\nParall\u00e8lement, Deguchi est un trentenaire travaillant dans l'ancienne entreprise de Shima. Il rencontre Onoda par l'interm\u00e9diaire d'amis communs. Sous son air jovial, Deguchi d\u00e9veloppe silencieusement une attirance pour lui. Il tente de multiplier les rencontres avec Onoda pour essayer de lui d\u00e9voiler ses sentiments."}

name: Kekkai Sensen
description: {"en":"Three years ago, a gateway between Earth and the \"Beyond\" opened over the city of New York. In one terrible night, New York was destroyed and rebuilt, trapping New Yorkers and extra-dimensional creatures alike in an unassailable island, a world all its own hidden in the mist of its physics-defying waterfalls.   \nNew York has been rechristened Hellsalem's Lot, a paranormal melting pot where magic and madness dwell alongside the mundane, where every form of human vermin gathers to exploit otherworldly assets for earthly profit. Now someone is threatening to breach the controlled flow of harmless, average humans and items in and (much more rarely) out of the city and thereby release Hellsalem's Lot's deluge of horrors on the outside world. The mysterious super-agents of \"Libra\" fight the impossible to prevent the unthinkable.","pt-br":"Kekkai Sensen gira em torno da organiza\u00e7\u00e3o de combate ao crime \"Libra\" e suas batalhas em Jerusalem's Lot, anteriormente conhecida como New York City. Jerusalem's Lot foi criado em uma \u00fanica noite, quando um portal para o \"Beyond\" abriu, e agora ele \u00e9 um caldeir\u00e3o paranormal de monstros, magia e da vida mundana da cidade todos os dias. Cabe a Libra evitar os horrores dessa cidade se espalhe para o mundo exterior.Quando o moderado Leonard Watch chega \u00e0 cidade, ele \u00e9 introduzido ao Libra e as coisas entram em uma espiral fora de controle a partir da\u00ed."}
